SA11bsa054_u:3839: Bca_6.48 etānāśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
SA11bsa054_u:3843: etānapakāriṇa āśritya nimittīkṛtya mama pāpaṃ pūrvajanmakṛtaparāpakārajanitaṃ kṣīyate tadduḥkhānubhavanavipākena kṣayaṃ yāti /
SA11bsa054_u:3846: māmāśritya matkarmacoditāḥ evamapyapakāraṃ kṛtvā punarete narakān tīvravedanān duḥsahaduḥkhānubhavān yānti /
SA11bsa054_u:3847: ata uktakrameṇa ahameva apakārī eṣāmityādi subodham //
SA11bsa054_u:3851: Bca_6.50 bhavenmamāśayaguṇo na yāmi narakān yadi /
SA11bsa054_u:3855: na tu punareṣāṃ durāśayatayā narakeṣu mamāpatanamiti bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3857: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- yadyahamapakārī sannapi kenacidupāyakauśalena narakān na yāmi,
SA11bsa054_u:3864: na caitāvatā kiṃcideṣāṃ nyūnādhikaṃ guṇadoṣeṣu syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:3867: Bca_6.51 atha pratyapakārī syāṃ tathāpyete na rakṣitāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3871: na kaścideṣāṃ pratīkāro narakagamanādiṣu kṛtaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3873: tathā sarvasattveṣu na maitracittaṃ mayā niści[kṣepta?]tavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:3876: tasmādetarhi pratīkāropāyābhāvāttapasvino varākā rakśitumaśakyatvānnaṣṭā durgatipatitā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:3878: paścāttadupāyamadhigamya tatkariṣyāmi yathaiṣāṃ duḥkhamaṇumātrakamapi na syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:3882: dvividhaṃ duḥkhamavicārato bādhakamupajāyate kāyikaṃ mānasikaṃ ceti /
SA11bsa054_u:3883: tatra manasi na kaściddaṇḍādikaṃ dātuṃ śaktaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:3885: iti tadudbhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ paramārthato na saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:3888: mamedaṃ śarīramiti vikalpābhyāsavāsanāvaśāt kāyaduḥkhena cittaṃ vihanyate //
SA11bsa054_u:3891: kāyaṃ na bādhate tena cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi //
SA11bsa054_u:3893: na hi kāyasyāyaṃ kaṃcidupaghātaṃ karotīti yena,
SA11bsa054_u:3895: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma nyakkārādayaḥ kāyasya bādhakā na bhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:3898: Bca_6.54 mayyaprasādo yo 'nyeṣāṃ sa māṃ kiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3903: sa kiṃ māṃ bhakṣayiṣyati ihaloke paraloka vā,
SA11bsa054_u:3908: naṅkṣyatīhaiva me lābhaḥ pāpaṃ tu sthāsyati dhruvam //
SA11bsa054_u:3916: tannimittaṃ nyakkārādikartṛṣu krudhyato yatpāpaṃ tadeva paraṃ sthāsyati paralokānubandhi bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3919: Bca_6.56 varamadyaiva me mṛtyurna mithyājīvitaṃ ciram /
SA11bsa054_u:3921: idameva varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yallābhābhāvādasminnevāhani me maraṇamastu,
SA11bsa054_u:3922: na tu punaḥ parāpakāradvāreṇa lābhapratilambhānmithyājīvitaṃ ciraṃ dīrghakālam /
SA11bsa054_u:3923: kutaḥ? yasmādvahutarakālamapi jīvitvā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam ityavaśyaṃbhāvino mṛtyorduḥkhaṃ tadeva mama /
SA11bsa054_u:3927: Bca_6.57 svapne varṣaśataṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yaśca vibudhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3929: Bca_6.58 nanu (nūnaṃ?) nivartate saukhyaṃ dvayorapi vibuddhayoḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:3934: anayordvayorapi svapnopalabdhopabhuktasukhayoḥ prativibuddhayoḥ satoḥ tadupalabdhaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ na nivartate,
SA11bsa054_u:3941: Bca_6.59 labdhvāpi ca bahūṃllābhān ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhānyapi /
SA11bsa054_u:3948: kaṭisūtrakamātramapi na pariśeṣitamiti nagnaśca cauraiḥ parimuṣita iva asmāllokātparaṃ lokaṃ yāsyāmi //
SA11bsa054_u:3949: syādetat- astyeva viśeṣo lābhasya cīvarādīnāmanupaghātādāyuḥsaṃskārāṇāmupastambhācciratarakālaṃ jīvitaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3950: tataśca pūrvakṛtapāpasya vidūṣaṇāsamudācārādinā parikṣayaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaraparirakṣaṇena bodhicittasevanādinā ca kuśalapakṣasya ca vṛddhiṃ kuryām / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:3953: ato lābhāntarāyakāriṇi yukta eva pradveṣa ityāśaṅkayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3954: pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet /
SA11bsa054_u:3955: lābhāduktakrameṇa jīvan dhriyamāṇaḥ pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca karomītyādi manyase /
SA11bsa054_u:3956: nanu etaditaḥ samadhikaṃ doṣamapaśyatā abhidhīyata ityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:3957: Bca_6.60 puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu //
SA11bsa054_u:3958: lābhārthaṃ lābhanimittaṃ tadantarāyakāriṇi dveṣaṃ kurvataḥ sukṛtakṣaya evopajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3960: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ- akṣāntisamudbhavasya pāpasya rāśirabhivardhate //
SA11bsa054_u:3961: athāpi syāt- yathākathaṃcit tāvaccirakālaṃ lābhājjīvitaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:3963: Bca_6.61 yadarthameva jīvāmi tadeva yadi naśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:3968: tadā kiṃ tena tādṛśena jīvitenāpi kevalāśubhakarmakaraṇaśīlena?
SA11bsa054_u:3992: parāśritāprasādattvādaprasādiṣu aprasannacitteṣu avarṇavādiṣu tava kṣamā kṣāntirūtpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:3995: yadi yaḥ parāyattāprasādaḥ tatra kṣamā bhavato bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:4002: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā //
SA11bsa054_u:4006: kutaḥ? yasmādbuddhādīnāṃ bodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vitathābhiniveśaprasūtātmagrāhanivṛtterabhiṣvaṅgābhāvānna vyathā cittapīḍālakṣaṇaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:4009: tathā viruddhadharmakāriṣu karuṇaiva tu yujyate teṣu sādhūnām /
SA11bsa054_u:4021: tathā priyāṇāṃ premasthānānāṃ cāpakāriṣu kopaṃ nivārayediti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4026: tadanena yathā aparasamaye devagurudvijātimātāpitṛprabhṛtīnāmarthe pāpaṃ kurvato 'pi na doṣa iti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:4028: kiṃ ca / idamapi vastutattvaṃ manasi kurvatā na sattveṣu cittaṃ dūṣayitavyamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4030: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4032: sā ca sāmagrī vastudharmatayā kācit kvacit samarthasvabhāvā /
SA11bsa054_u:4037: svayameva yadṛcchayā vā loṣṭakuḍyādyabhighātajanitā vā dehināṃ śarīriṇāṃ niyatā vyathā niyamena samutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4039: sā caivaṃ dvividhakāraṇasāmagrīprasūtāpi cetane savijñānake kāye dṛṣṭā pramāṇapariniścitā /
SA11bsa054_u:4043: tato yad yasyotpattisthānaṃ tat tatraiva bhavati nānyatra,
SA11bsa054_u:4045: ataḥ asmānyāyāt kṣamasva sahasva enāmanantarakathitobhayarūpāṃ vyathām //
SA11bsa054_u:4047: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam //
SA11bsa054_u:4053: itthaṃ brūmaḥ- kam eṣu kleśarākṣasāveśavaśīkṛteṣu nirdoṣam,
SA11bsa054_u:4056: [Bcp_99] idamapi ca ātmagatameva cintayatā pratighacittaṃ nivartayitavyamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4057: Bca_6.68 kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4065: tathāpi pratīkāro yukta ityāha- sarva ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:4066: sarve duḥkhahetavaḥ karmapratyayopajanitapravṛttayaḥ iti ko 'hamatra anyathākṛtau tatphalanivartanāya? na kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:4069: Bca_6.69 evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham /
SA11bsa054_u:4071: ete sattvāḥ karmakleśaparāyattāḥ parasparamasamañjasakarmakāriṇo nivartayitumaśakyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:4072: evaṃ buddhvā jñātvā punaḥ puṇyeṣu kuśaleṣu karmasu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham,
SA11bsa054_u:4074: yena tathāvidhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ pratilabhya sanmārge pravartitāḥ santaḥ sarve maitracittā hitasukhavidhānatatparāḥ parasparamanyonyaṃ bhaviṣyanti //
SA11bsa054_u:4075: drohacittaṃ vinivartya priyavastūpaghātakāriṇi laukikodāharaṇena dveṣaṃ nivartayediti ślokadvayamupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4080: ekasmin gṛhe 'gninā dahyamāne yathā tasmād gṛhādanyad gṛhaṃ gṛhāntaraṃ gatvā /
SA11bsa054_u:4082: tadantargatamanyadapi vastu mā dhākṣīditi śaṅkayā tadākṛṣyāpanīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4085_0: evamuktodāharaṇanyāyena cittaṃ mano yasya vastuna āsaṅgādāsakto dahyate paritapyate
SA11bsa054_u:4085_1: dveṣavahninā pratighānalena tadāsaṅgasthānaṃ vastu tatkṣaṇaṃ na kālāntarapalimbena
SA11bsa054_u:4089: tasya uktakrameṇa uddāhaḥ parikṣayo mā bhūt /
SA11bsa054_u:4098: pratyuta labdhalābhamātmānaṃ manyate atyalpamidaṃ maraṇaduḥkhāt karacchedanaduḥkhamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:4099: tathā yo 'pi manuṣyaduḥkhaṃ tāḍanabandhanatiraskārādikṛtamanubhūya narakaduḥkhādvimukto bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:4105: athāpi syāt- na mayā svalpamātre 'pi duḥkhe kṣamā kartuṃ śakyata iti, atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4106: Bca_6.73 yadyetanmātramevādya duḥkhaṃ soḍhuṃ na pāryate /
SA11bsa054_u:4108: khaṭacapeṭaloṣṭādiprahārakṛtamīṣanmātramapi duḥkhamidānīṃ soḍhuṃ marṣituṃ na pāryate na śakyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4110: tadayaṃ nārakaduḥkhasaṃvartanīyaḥ krodhaḥ kopaḥ kasmātkāraṇānna vāryate?
SA11bsa054_u:4111: ayameva hi atitarāṃ narakeṣu duḥkhadāyaka iti duḥkhabhīrūṇāmeva krodhaṃ nivartayituṃ yuktaṃ syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:4112: kiṃ ca / yadyapi soḍhuṃ na śakyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4115: marṣaṇāt punastasya mahārthalābho bhaviṣyatīti vṛttadvayena śikṣayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4117: Bca_6.74 kārito 'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā //
SA11bsa054_u:4118: Bca_6.75 na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:4125: evaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāpi mayā na ca naiva ātmārthaḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalasādhanaḥ kṛto niṣpāditaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4128: tadadyāpi na tathaiva mamāsahiṣṇutā yuktetyāha- idaṃ duḥkhaṃ naiva tādṛśaṃ yādṛśaṃ narakasamudbhavam /
SA11bsa054_u:4129: atha ca mahārthaṃ sarvasattvahitasukhavidhānabhūtaṃ buddhatvaṃ sādhayiṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:4130: ato jagato duḥkhahare trijagatparyāpannasarvasattvaduḥkhapraśamanakare duḥkhe prītirevātra yujyate nāruciriti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4132: Bca_6.76 yadi prītisukhaṃ prāptamanyaiḥ stutvā guṇorjitam /
SA11bsa054_u:4133: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi //
SA11bsa054_u:4134: guṇādhikaṃ stutvā yadi prītisukhaṃ kaiścit prāptam,
SA11bsa054_u:4135: tadā he manaḥ tvamapi tadguṇasaṃvarṇanena kimiti harṣasukhaṃ nānubhavasi?
SA11bsa054_u:4140: yatra yatra ratiṃ yāti manaḥ sukhavimohitam /
SA11bsa054_u:4145: Bca_6.77 idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam /
SA11bsa054_u:4149: idaṃ ca paraguṇāśrayaṃ hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ tava,
SA11bsa054_u:4152: ata eva na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhirbhagavacchāsanavidhijñaiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4155: guṇeṣu evamayaṃ matsarīti manyamānā anye 'pi sattvā āvarjitā bhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:4158: kiṃ tarhi tāvattasyaiva sukhametaditi mayā soḍhumaśakyamiti / atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4159: Bca_6.78 tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
SA11bsa054_u:4161: tasyaiva stutikartuḥ sukhamiti evamanenābhiprāyeṇa bhavato yadi idaṃ paraguṇastutipratisamudbhavaṃ sukhaṃ na priyam,
SA11bsa054_u:4164: yadapi ca bhavataḥ svātmasukhanimittaṃ svabhṛtyādiṣu bhṛtidānaṃ karmamūlyadānam,
SA11bsa054_u:4172: kiṃ ca / mithyottaramevedaṃ bhavata iti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4184: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
SA11bsa054_u:4192: yataḥ sarvasattvāḥ triadhātukāntaścarāḥ samastasukhasaṃpattisaṃtarpitā buddhatvamadhigamya mayā kartavyāḥ iti manasikāreṇa bodhicittamutpādyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4197: iti akaraṇīyameva tat parasukhavaimukhyacittaṃ bodhisattvasyeti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4198: yaḥ punarutpāditabodhicitto 'pi parasya lābhasatkārasaṃpattimabhisamīkṣya tadīrṣyākaṣāyitahṛdayaḥ tenaiva śokena dahyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4200: Bca_6.81 trailokyapūjyaṃ buddhatvaṃ sattvānāṃ kila vāñchasi /
SA11bsa054_u:4202: athavā syādetat- na khalu mayā tatsukhameva na mṛṣyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4204: trayo lokāeva kāmarūpārūpyadhātulakṣaṇāḥ lokaprasiddhayā vā svargādisvabhāvāḥ trailokyam,
SA11bsa054_u:4214: Bca_6.82 puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4216: tvayā poṣaṇīyaṃ priyaputrakādikaṃ tvadīyaṃ yaḥ puṣṇāti,
SA11bsa054_u:4219: ataḥ tvatkuṭumbajīvinaṃ tvadīyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ jīvayati yaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4220: taṃ tathāvidhaṃ puruṣaṃ labdhvā prāpya prahṛṣyasi na?
SA11bsa054_u:4223: tathā prakṛte 'pi yena sarvasattvā ātmīyatvena gṛhītāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4227: sa kiṃ necchasi sattvānāṃ yasteṣāṃ bodhimicchati /
SA11bsa054_u:4229: jagadadya nimantritaṃ mayā sugatatvena sukhena cāntarā //
SA11bsa054_u:4233: tathāpi yaḥ samutpāditabodhicittaḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhiṃ buddhatvamicchati,
SA11bsa054_u:4243: api ca / aparasya lābhasatkārasaṃpadabhāve 'pi na bhavatastadbhāvasaṃbhavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4244: tatkimakāraṇameva tadvidveṣiṇā ātmaghātāya yatnaḥ kriyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4245: Bca_6.84 yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe /
SA11bsa054_u:4246: sarvathāpi na tatte 'sti dattādattena tena kim //
SA11bsa054_u:4247: yadi nāma tena tava akṣamāviṣayeṇa sattvena taddīyamānaṃ vastu na labdham,
SA11bsa054_u:4250: sarvathāpi tena labdhena gṛhāvasthitena vā na tadvastu tavāsti /
SA11bsa054_u:4255: Bca_6.85 kiṃ vārayatu puṇyāni prasannān svaguṇānatha /
SA11bsa054_u:4256: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi //
SA11bsa054_u:4258: sa kiṃ vārayatu puṇyāni pūrvajanmakṛtāni vipākonmukhāni,
SA11bsa054_u:4266: brūhi kena prakāreṇa atra na bhavato 'paritoṣaḥ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4267: tatra puṇyādīnāṃ vārayitumaśakyatvāt labhyamānāgrahaṇe 'pi sarvathāpi na tatte 'stītyādinā bādhakasyoktatvāditi na kiṃcit paritoṣakāraṇamasti //
SA11bsa054_u:4268: athāpi syāt- parasyaiva lābhasatkārasaṃpattirasti, na mama /
SA11bsa054_u:4272: Bca_6.86 na kevalaṃ tvamātmānaṃ kṛtapāpaṃ na śocasi /
SA11bsa054_u:4282: [Bcp_104] yat kiṃcit sukhaṃ tat sarvaṃ puṇyaprasūtam /
SA11bsa054_u:4283: iti sukhābhilāṣiṇā śubhe karmaṇi udyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4287: iti kathaṃ kṛtapuṇyaiḥ saha spardhā yujyate?
SA11bsa054_u:4291: tava śatrordveṣaviṣayasya tvadabhilāṣamātreṇa apriyamaniṣṭaṃ jātamutpannaṃ ced yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:4303: atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava /
SA11bsa054_u:4304: yadi nāma tavecchayā siddhaṃ niṣpannamapriyaṃ śatroḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4305: tathāpi tasya duḥkhe samutpanne kiṃ sukhaṃ tava? na kiṃcit /
SA11bsa054_u:4307: nanu idameva prayojanaṃ yat tadduḥkhe mama saṃtuṣṭirityata āha-
SA11bsa054_u:4308: Bca_6.88 athāpyartho bhavedevamanarthaḥ ko nvataḥ paraḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4309: evamapi paraduḥkhaparitoṣe yadi arthaḥ prayojanaṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:4310: tadā ataḥ paraḥ anarthaḥ ko nu?
SA11bsa054_u:4318: kleśā eva baḍiśena carantīti bāḍiśikāḥ tairarpitamādattam /
SA11bsa054_u:4321: narakapālā yamapuruṣāḥ tvāṃ krītvā pakṣyanti pakṣyante /
SA11bsa054_u:4327: Bca_6.90 stutiryaśo 'tha satkāro na puṇyāya na cāyuṣe /
SA11bsa054_u:4328: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me //
SA11bsa054_u:4337: iyāneva hi svārtho bhavato bhavet prajñāvataḥ svārthavedinaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4347: tadicchatā madyaṃ dyūtaṃ gaṇikā pāradārikaṃ sevanīyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4350: tasmāt saumanasya heturbhavato 'pi stutyādayo bālajanānandakāriṇo 'nupādeyā eva //
SA11bsa054_u:4353_0: kecinmohapuruṣāḥ tādṛśaguṇāt svayamatisudūre vartamānā api śakrādiguṇaiḥ stūyamānā
SA11bsa054_u:4353_1: bandijanairanyaiśca protphullanayanavadanā yaśorthino hastyaśvādidhanaṃ tṛṇavat tebhyaḥ prayacchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:4354: tathā taireva guṇaiḥ saṃbhāvitātmanāmapi śakravat śatruvijayasamudbhūtaṃ yaśo mama jagati vipulatāṃ gamiṣyati,
SA11bsa054_u:4358: Bca_6.92 kimakṣarāṇi bhakṣyāṇi mṛte kasya ca tatsukham //
SA11bsa054_u:4359: stutyādyabhidhāyakāni akṣarāṇi varṇāḥ kiṃ bhakṣyāṇi carvitavyāni?
SA11bsa054_u:4360: yaśorthaṃ mṛte sati kasya ca tat sukhaṃ yaśaḥśravaṇasamuttham?
SA11bsa054_u:4363: yathā kaścid bālo dhūlimayagṛheṇa paramaparitoṣeṇa parikrīḍamānaḥ kenacit tasmin bhagne mahadduḥkhena parigṛhītaḥ paramārtipīḍita iva madgṛhaṃ bhagnamiti karuṇasvaraṃ krandati,
SA11bsa054_u:4365: Bca_6.93 tathā stutiyaśohānau svacittaṃ pratibhāti me //
SA11bsa054_u:4366: tathaiva stutiyaśohānau vighāte svacittaṃ duḥkhamāviśat pratibhāsate vicārayato mama /
SA11bsa054_u:4367: atrāpi na vastusatā kenacid vipralambha iti parāmarṣṭavyam //
SA11bsa054_u:4368: [Bcp_106] punaranyathā vicāreṇa bāladharma evāyamiti caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ parāmṛśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4372: sa śabdo māṃ stauti madīyaṃ varṇamudīrayati /
SA11bsa054_u:4375: Bca_6.94 paraḥ kila mayi prīta ityetatprītikāraṇam //
SA11bsa054_u:4383: Bca_6.95 anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
SA11bsa054_u:4384: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo 'pi me tataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4385: yasmādanyasmin mayi vā prītyā parasaṃtānavartinyā kimāyātaṃ mama? na kiṃcit /
SA11bsa054_u:4386: kutaḥ? tasyaiva tato ya eva prītaḥ stutikartā,
SA11bsa054_u:4388: ato bhāgo nālpo 'pi īṣadapi mama tataḥ parasaṃtānavartinaḥ prītisukhāt //
SA11bsa054_u:4390: tat kimiti tato bhāgo nāstīti? atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4391: Bca_6.96 tatsukhena sukhitvaṃ cetsarvatraiva mamāstu tat /
SA11bsa054_u:4394: tadā tasminnanyatra prasādena sukhite 'pi mamāstu tatsukhitvam /
SA11bsa054_u:4396: na tvanyasmin prasādena sukhiteṣu mama sukham //
SA11bsa054_u:4401: tadanyanimittābhāvāt ahaṃ stuta ityevaṃ vikalpanāt prītirātmabni jāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4404: ātmanyapi evamuktakrameṇa asaṃbandhādapratyāsatteḥ kāraṇāt kevalaṃ bālavilasitametat //
SA11bsa054_u:4405: [Bcp_107] api ca / stutyādayo mama apacayameva dadhatītyupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4406: Bca_6.98 stutyādayaśca me kṣemaṃ saṃvegaṃ nāśayantyamī /
SA11bsa054_u:4407: guṇavatsu ca mātsaryaṃ saṃpatkopaṃ ca kurvate //
SA11bsa054_u:4415: tadguṇāsahanatayā vā saṃpadi lābhasatkārādisvabhāvāyāṃ kopaṃ ca amarṣaṃ kurvate teṣveva /
SA11bsa054_u:4422: stutyādighātāya virodhāya ye sattvā mama pratyupasthitā udyatāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4424: tato rakṣārthaṃ trāṇārthaṃ rakṣaṇanimittaṃ pravṛttā udyuktā nanu te mama /
SA11bsa054_u:4429: ye mocayanti māṃ bandhādveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama //
SA11bsa054_u:4433: kalyāṇamitrakṛtyakāriṇaḥ śatrutvenābhimatā vimocayanti viyojayanti māṃ bandhāt saṃsāraduḥkhalakṣaṇāt lābhādisvabhāvādvā /
SA11bsa054_u:4443: Bca_6.102 puṇyavighnaḥ kṛto 'nenetyatra kopo na yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4445: [Bcp_108] kuśalavighātaḥ kṛto 'nena ityevaṃ manasi nidhāya atra puṇyavighātakāriṇi dveṣo na yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4446: kasmāt? yataḥ kṣāntyā titikṣayā samaṃ tulyaṃ tapaḥ sukṛtaṃ nāsti sarvaśubhakarmahetutvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4451: tatra pradveṣe tu ātmanaiva puṇyavighātaḥ kṛto bhavedityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4454: atha yadi ātmana eva doṣeṇa asahiṣṇutātmakena na karomi kṣamāṃ kṣāntimiha vighnakāriṇi,
SA11bsa054_u:4455: tadā mayaiva na punaranyena atra puṇye kṛto vighnaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4461: Bca_6.104 yo hi yena vinā nāsti yasmiṃśca sati vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4462: sa eva kāraṇaṃ tasya sa kathaṃ vighna ucyate //
SA11bsa054_u:4463: yo bhāvaḥ kāryābhimataḥ yena kāraṇābhimatena vinā nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:4468: evaṃ prakṛte 'pi sa janaka eva kathaṃ tasya janyasya vighna ucyate vighātaheturabhidhīyate?
SA11bsa054_u:4469: tathāvidhe 'pi tathā vyavahāraṃ kurvato nāsti vipratipattiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4471: Bca_6.105 na hi kālopapannena dānavighnaḥ kṛto 'rthinā /
SA11bsa054_u:4472: na ca pravrājake prāpte pravrajyāvighna ucyate //
SA11bsa054_u:4473: na yasmāt kasyaciddānapaterditsākāle eva saṃprāptenārthinā yācanakena dānavighnaḥ kṛtaḥ ityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:4475: tathā kasyacit pravrajitukāmasya pravrājakasamavadhānaṃ pravrajyā saṃvarādigrahaṇasvabhāvā,
SA11bsa054_u:4480: api ca / kṣāntiheturatidurlabha iti tatsamāgame prītireva yujyate ityupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4482: atipracuraprāptikā yācanakā loke sarvatra sarveṣāṃ dīyamānagrahaṇāvaimukhyāt,
SA11bsa054_u:4485: yadi kathaṃcit kaścit syādvā na veti /
SA11bsa054_u:4488: [Bcp_109] yasmādanaparādhasya nivṛttaparāpakārasya mama nirnimittaṃ na kaścideko 'pi aparādhyati,
SA11bsa054_u:4495: tasmād gṛhe prādurbhūto nidhiriva śramamantareṇaivādhigato ripurabhilaṣaṇīya eva mayā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:4497: evaṃvidhe paramapuruṣārthe sāhāyyaṃ bhajamānasya pratyupakārakaraṇameva kṛtajñatayā mama yuktamityupadarśayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4498: Bca_6.108 mayā cānena copāttaṃ tasmādetat kṣamāphalam /
SA11bsa054_u:4500: yasmādasau tatra sāhāyyaṃ kurvan kāraṇameva na vighnaḥ tasmānmayā kṣamāmabhyastatā,
SA11bsa054_u:4504: kṣamāphalaṃ dharmādhigamalakṣaṇam etasmai dharmasahāyāya prathamamagrato dātavyaṃ mayā iti praṇidhātavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:4507: eṣa eva pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
SA11bsa054_u:4511: Bca_6.109 kṣamāsiddhayāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4515: tena kāraṇena kuśalaheturapi yadi śatruḥ pūjanīyo na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:4516: evaṃ tarhi kuśalaniṣpattihetuḥ nirabhiprāyo 'pi saddharmaḥ pravacanalakṣaṇaḥ kathaṃ pūjyate?
SA11bsa054_u:4517: so 'pi tadāśayaśūnyatvāt pūjanīyo na syāt, iti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4523: ityevamabhisaṃdhāya śatruryadi na pūjyate dānamānairna satkriyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4524: anyatheti apakāriṇi dveṣacittamanivārayataḥ kathaṃ mama kṣāntiḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:4525: tadapakāramasahamānasya [Bcp_110] pratyapakāraṃ vā kurvato naiva yuktetyarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4536: ataḥ asmāddhetoḥ tasya duṣṭāśayameva pratītya nimittīkṛtya samupajāyate kṣamā /
SA11bsa054_u:4538: ataḥ asmāt sa eva yasyāśayaṃ pratītyotpadyate kṣamā kṣamāhetuḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4541: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kiṃ mamānena āśayavicāreṇa prayojanam?
SA11bsa054_u:4556: kutaḥ? yato yasmādetān sattvān jināṃśca ārādhya ānukūlyānuṣṭhānena bahavo buddhatvamadhigamya sarvalaukikalokottarasarvasaṃpattiparyantaṃ prāptāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4557: syādetat- yadi nāma sattvā api sarvasaṃpattihetavaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4558: tathāpi tathāgataiḥ saha sādhāraṇatā na yukteti / atrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4560: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4561: ubhayebhyo 'pi buddhadharmāṇāṃ balavaiśāradyādīnāmāgame pratilambhe tulye aviśiṣṭe /
SA11bsa054_u:4563: ataḥ sādhāraṇe 'pi hetubhāve jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvat,
SA11bsa054_u:4567: nanu ca sattvānāṃ rāgādimalairhīnāśayatvāt kāraṇatve 'pi kathaṃ bhagavatsamānatā yujyate ityāśaṅkayāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4568: Bca_6.114 āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4569: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4571: tathāpi upayuktopayogitvena hetubhāvasya tulyatvāt samaṃ māhātmyamucyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4572: tena hetunā te sattvāḥ samāḥ jinaistulyā ucyante iti nātra viśeṣaḥ kriyate //
SA11bsa054_u:4586: paramārthatastu na buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ samāḥ kecit sattvāḥ santi /
SA11bsa054_u:4599: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam //
SA11bsa054_u:4604: tasya tadguṇādhārasya pūjānimittaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam /
SA11bsa054_u:4614: aparyantopakāriṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ tatkṛtāpakārasya niṣkrayaṇaṃ pariśodhanamiti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:4617: prabhucittānukūlavartina eva bhṛtyasya vāñchitaṃ sidhyatītyavagamya sattvārādhanamevopādeyamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4618: Bca_6.120 bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīciṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4620: karacaraṇaśironayanasvamāṃsāni chittvā chittvā pradattāni yeṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānāya,
SA11bsa054_u:4621: tathā avīcīmapi paraduḥkhaduḥkhino yeṣāṃ kṛte praviśanti tatsamuddharaṇāya /
SA11bsa054_u:4623: tatra teṣu sattveṣu kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:4624: anyathā tu kṛtamapi na kṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:4626: yenaivam, tena paramāpakāriṣvapi na cittaṃ dūṣayitavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:4627: kiṃ tu sarvamanekaprakāraṃ kāyavāṅmanobhirvā kalyāṇameva hitasukhameva vidhātavyameteṣu //
SA11bsa054_u:4629: Bca_6.121 svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yadarthamātmanyapi nirvyapeikṣāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4630: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam //
SA11bsa054_u:4631: mama svāmina eva buddhādayaḥ svayameva ātmanaiva /
SA11bsa054_u:4636: tadahaṃ punaḥ teṣāṃ bhṛtyaḥ teṣu sattveṣu prabhuputreṣvatyantapriyeṣu kathaṃ karomi mānam,
SA11bsa054_u:4640: ito 'pi ca sattvāpakāraṃ parityajya tadārādhanameva kartavyamityāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4641: Bca_6.122 yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
SA11bsa054_u:4643: yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ priyaputrāṇāmiva pitaro munīndrā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sukhe kāyamanojanmani mudaṃ harṣaṃ yānti,
SA11bsa054_u:4644: yeṣāṃ ca duḥkhe manyuṃ praviśanti aparitoṣamāsādayanti /
SA11bsa054_u:4652: Bca_6.123 ādīptakāyasya yathā samantānna sarvakāmairapi saumanasyam /
SA11bsa054_u:4654: samantāt sarvāvayavānabhivyāpya vahninā prajvalitaśarīrasya yathā pañcakāmaguṇairna saumanasyam,
SA11bsa054_u:4657: tadvat tathaiva sattvānāṃ vyathāyāṃ duḥkhavedanāyāṃ na prīteḥ saumanasyasya upāyo heturasti kṛpātmakānāṃ bhagavatām //
SA11bsa054_u:4660: Bca_6.124 tasmānmayā yajjanaduḥkhadena duḥkhaṃ kṛtaṃ sarvamahākṛpāṇām /
SA11bsa054_u:4667: yadi pratirūpamācaritaṃ tatra me kṣāntiṃ kurvantu anukampāmupādāya //
SA11bsa054_u:4669: Bca_6.125 ārādhanāyādya tathāgatānāṃ sarvātmanā dāsyamupaimi loke /
SA11bsa054_u:4670: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughā vighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4671: tathāgatānāmabhipretasaṃpādanāya loke lokaviṣaye sarvātmanā kāyena vācā manasā vā dāsībhāvaṃ svīkaromi /
SA11bsa054_u:4672: te 'pi me prasādaṃ kurvanto mastake pādaṃ nidadhatu /
SA11bsa054_u:4674: anena mayi purvāparādhamapāsya jagatāṃ patirbhagavān saṃtuṣṭamānaso bhavatu //
SA11bsa054_u:4675: [Bcp_114] bhagavatsu ca gauravakāribhiḥ sattveṣvanādaro na kartavya iti prasādhayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4676: Bca_6.126 ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ kṛpātmabhirnaiva hi saṃśayo 'sti /
SA11bsa054_u:4677: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarūpāsta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra //
SA11bsa054_u:4678: sarvatragadharmadhātuprativedhāt sarvasattvasamatāpādanaparātmaparivartanādinā vā ātmīkṛtaṃ svīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat,
SA11bsa054_u:4683: tasmāt sattvarūpeṇa buddhā bhagavanta evaite sattvā dṛśyante /
SA11bsa054_u:4699: sa ca āgāmirājadaṇḍabhayadarśitayā mahājano vacanamātreṇāpi yāvadvikāramupagantumasamarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4702: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam /
SA11bsa054_u:4707: Bca_6.129 tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcidaparāddhaṃ vimānayet //
SA11bsa054_u:4718: na tu punaḥ sattvāprasaktiphalasya rājāparādhaphalena samānatā samastītyāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4719: Bca_6.131 kupitaḥ kiṃ nṛpaḥ kuryādyena syānnarakavyathā /
SA11bsa054_u:4724: kiṃbhūtam? yena duḥkhajātena nārakī vedanā anubhūyate //
SA11bsa054_u:4731: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4734: tadevaṃ vipakṣapratiṣedhena tridhā kṣāntiṃ pratipādya vīryaṃ pratipādayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4735: Bca_7.1 evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
SA11bsa054_u:4736: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vināgatiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4751: Bca_7.2 kiṃ vīryaṃ kuśalotsāhastadvipakṣaḥ ka ucyate /
SA11bsa054_u:4755: yo 'yaṃ kuśalakarmaṇi dānādau śrutādau ca samudyamaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4758: vipakṣeṇopahataṃ vīryamanaṅgamevābhimatasiddhaye iti tadvipakṣamapanayanāya darśayitumāha- tadvipakṣa ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:4759: tasya vīryasya viruddho vināśāya pakṣo vipakṣaḥ ka ucyate?
SA11bsa054_u:4795: adyāpi etāṃ daśāṃ prāpto 'pi mṛtyormukhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ san kimiti na vetsi?
SA11bsa054_u:4807: tena tāvatkālaṃ sukhānubhavanameva mama yuktamityatrāha- yadi nāmaivam,
SA11bsa054_u:4810: kathaṃ te rocate bhoktuṃ kathaṃ nidrā kathaṃ ratiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:4811: iti vadhyapuruṣasyeva sarvato vadhyaghātakairadhiṣṭhitasya vadhyabhūmiṃ nīyamānasya niḥsaraṇamapaśyataḥ sukhāsikāvalambanamanucitameva bhavataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4813: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma avaśyaṃbhāvitā mṛtyoḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4817: saṃbhṛtaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ saṃbhāraḥ sāmagrī vadhāya vyādhijarālakṣaṇo yena /
SA11bsa054_u:4820: tadā mṛtyumukhāntargataḥ asamaye ālasyaṃ tyaktvāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi?
SA11bsa054_u:4829: idaṃ yadanāgate kartavyatayā manasikṛtaṃ tanna prāptam /
SA11bsa054_u:4835: hato 'smīti vicintayan vihvalaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasītyanāgatena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4838: tena samucchūnāni samunnatāni sāśrūṇi sabāṣpāṇi raktāni tāmravarṇāni locanāni yeṣu ānaneṣu tāni tathā /
SA11bsa054_u:4839: tathābhūtāni ānanāni mukhāni yeṣāṃ bandhūnāṃ te tathā /
SA11bsa054_u:4845: maraṇasamayopasthitakṛtāntānucaramukhāni ca saroṣaparuṣabhṛkuṭīni saṃpaśyan vihvalaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi?
SA11bsa054_u:4846: svayaṃkṛtapāpakarmasmaraṇena maraṇasamaye kimityevaṃ mayā kṛtamiti paścāttāpena tāpitaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4848: kiṃ tu śṛṇvannādāṃśca nārakān tīvrakāraṇānubhavanadukhanirmuktān vikrośitaśabdān narakasamudbhūtān arthāntarakopāṇāmeva (?) /
SA11bsa054_u:4849: tacchrutvā mamāpyevamevāvasthā iti saṃtrāsena yaḥ purīṣotsargo viṭpravṛttiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:4853: iti matvā svasthāvasthāyāmeva yatitavyam iti śikṣayitumāha-
SA11bsa054_u:4854: Bca_7.11 jīvamatsya ivāsmīti yuktaṃ bhayamihaiva te /
SA11bsa054_u:4856: jīvanta eva matsyāḥ krameṇa bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prāyaḥ prāgdiṅanivāsibhireva janai rakṣyante /
SA11bsa054_u:4857: jīvanopalakṣitā matsyā jīvamatsyā iti teṣāmeva samayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:4859: tadvadahamapi adya śvo vā niyatameva mariṣyāmi iti manasi kṛtvā yuktaṃ bhayamihaiva te /

SA11bsa054_u:7182: ataḥ sarvopādhiśūnyatvāt kathaṃ kayācit kalpanayā paśyet?
SA11bsa054_u:7184: vikalpajanmāno hi śabdā vikalpadhiyāmaviṣaye na pravartitumutsahante /
SA11bsa054_u:7186: tathāpi bhājanaśrotṛjanānugrahārthaṃ parikalpamupādāya saṃvṛtyā nidarśanopadarśanena kiṃcidabhidhīyate //
SA11bsa054_u:7187: yathā timiraprabhāvāt taimirikaḥ sarvamākāśadeśaṃ keśoṇḍukamaṇḍitamitastato mukhaṃ vikṣipannapi paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7188: tathā kurvantamavekṣya ataimirikaḥ kimayaṃ karotīti tatsamīpamupasṛtya tadupalabdhakeśapraṇihitalocano 'pi na keśākṛtimupalabhate,
SA11bsa054_u:7190: yadā punarasau taimirikaḥ ataimirikāya svābhiprāyaṃ prakāśayati- keśāniha paśyāmīti,
SA11bsa054_u:7191: tadā tadvikalpāpasāraṇāya tasmai yathābhūtamasau bravīti- nātra keśāḥ santīti /
SA11bsa054_u:7193: na ca tena tathā pratipādayatāpi kasyacit pratiṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavati vidhānaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:7198: tāneva skandhādīn yena svabhāvena nirastasamastāvidyāvāsanā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paśyanti ataimirikopalabdhakeśadarśananyāyena,
SA11bsa054_u:7204: iti paramārthato 'vācyamapi paramārthatattvaṃ dṛṣṭāntadvāreṇa saṃvṛtimupādāya kathaṃcit kathitam /
SA11bsa054_u:7205: na tu tadaśeṣasāṃvṛtavyavahāravirahitasvabhāvaṃ vastuto vaktuṃ śakyate iti / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:7206: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā /
SA11bsa054_u:7220: nanu ca tathāvidhamapi tathāvidhabuddhiviṣayaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃ na bhavatītyatrāha- buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7227: iti naiva kācid buddhiḥ pāramārthikarūpagrāhiṇī paramārthato yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7231: yadi hi devaputra paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavāṅyanasāṃ viṣayatāmupagacchet,
SA11bsa054_u:7243: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam /
SA11bsa054_u:7255: yāvanna lābho nālabho na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśo na rūpaṃ nārūpamityādi //
SA11bsa054_u:7261: evaṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthabhedena dvividhaṃ satyaṃ vyavasthāpya tadadhikṛtaśca loko 'pi dvividha evetyupadarśayannāha- tatra loke ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7262: Bca_9.3 tatra loko dvidhā dṛṣṭo yogī prākṛtakastathā /
SA11bsa054_u:7274: so 'syāstīti yogī loka ityekaḥ prakāro rāśiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7277: prākṛta eva prākṛtako loka iti dvitīyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7280: syādetat- ubhayorapi yathāsvaṃ tattvadarśitvāt kataraḥ punaranayorbhrāntimānastu ya evānyatareṇa bādhyate?
SA11bsa054_u:7281: kaḥ punaranayoḥ kena bādhyata ityāha- tatretyādi /
SA11bsa054_u:7284: tatra tayoryogiprākṛtakayorlokayormadhye prākṛtako lokaḥ prākṛtakatvajātyā samudāyānnirdhāryate,
SA11bsa054_u:7292: idamihābhimatam- yathā vibhramāhitasadbhāvaṃ timiropahatacakṣuṣaḥ asadbhūtakeśoṇḍukādidarśino jñānaṃ yathāvasthitavastutattvagrāhiṇo 'taimirikajñānena bādhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7301: atha kiṃ prākṛtā eva bādhyante yogibhiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7308: uttare ca uttare ca uttarottarāḥ, taiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7314: dhiyo jñānasya prajñāyā viśeṣaḥ tattadāvaraṇavigamāt prakarṣaḥ, tena /
SA11bsa054_u:7317: tathā hi- pramuditākhyaprathamabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānādiguṇāpekṣayā taduttaravimalābhidhānadvitīyabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānaprabhāvādayo guṇā viśiṣyante /
SA11bsa054_u:7321: syādetat- satyapi yogināṃ dhiyo viśeṣe prākṛtajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti kathamavagamayituṃ śakyata ityāha dṛṣṭāntenobhayeṣṭeneti-
SA11bsa054_u:7328: tathā hi- ye tāvat sarvajanapratipannasvarūpā rūpādayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7332: atastatra ubhayorapi vipratipatterabhāvāt dṛṣṭāntadharmatā na vihanyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7333: yeṣāṃ tu mīmāṃsakādīnāṃ deśakālānyathātmakaṃ vastu eva tattathā pratibhāsate iti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:7334: te 'nyatra nirākṛtā iti na tanmatamiha nirasyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7335: ye tu svayūthyāḥ cittameva vastusat svapnādiṣu tathā pratibhāsate iti manyante,
SA11bsa054_u:7338: atastena dṛṣṭāntena viparītavastusvarūpagrāhitayā prākṛtakajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti vyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7340: nanu yadi niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti vastutattvam,
SA11bsa054_u:7341: kathaṃ tarhi sarvasattvasamuddharaṇāśayena dānādiṣu saṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ tattvavedināmapi bodhisattvānāṃ pravṛttiḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:7348: tathābhūteṣvapi tatra idaṃpratyayatāniyamasya vidyamānatvāt na hetuphalabhāvasya virodhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7349: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi māyādisvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvā dānādayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7350: tathāpi trikoṭipariśuddhyā sādarādiyogena abhyasyamānāḥ tathābhūtā api paramārthādhigamāya hetubhāvamāpadyante,
SA11bsa054_u:7362: sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt hetvanurūpaṃ ca sarvatra phalamiṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7363: ataḥ sāṃvṛtādapi niḥsvabhāvāddhetoḥ niḥsvabhāvatādhigama eva phalam,
SA11bsa054_u:7365: iti dānādayo vastuto niḥsvabhāvā api paramārthatattvādhigamāya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāyamānairbodhisattvairupādīyante,
SA11bsa054_u:7373: Bca_9.5 lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7376: hetupratyayaṃ pratītya bhavanti svarūpaṃ labhante iti bhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7379: satsvarūpeṇa na kevalaṃ dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7385: na tu punaryathā yoginā māyeva māyāvat svabhāvaśūnyā dṛśyante,
SA11bsa054_u:7387: ityatrāsmin vivādo vipratipattiryogilokayoḥ yoginā saha lokasyetyarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7388: tatpratipanne vastuttattve lokasyāpratipatteḥ lokena saha vā yoginaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7390: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- sarvabhāvānāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ceti rūpadvayamasti,
SA11bsa054_u:7391: tatra yat sāṃvṛtaṃ tadeva lokena pratīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7396: athāpi syāt- yadetat samastajanasādhāraṇamarthakriyākṣamaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇapratītaṃ vasturūpam,
SA11bsa054_u:7397: tat kathamapahrotuṃ śakyata iti parasya hṛdayamāśaṅkayāha pratyakṣamapītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7401: tadapi prasiddhayā rūḍhyā lokapravādena na pramāṇataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7402: na pramāṇenādhigataṃ sat pratyakṣaṃ rūpādīti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7412: rūpādi tattvaṃ pratyakṣamapi yadi na pramāṇādhigatam,
SA11bsa054_u:7416: yathā ca paramārthato 'śucini strīkalevarādau tadāsaktiviparyastacetasāṃ śucibuddhirupajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7423: tathā hi skandhadhātvāyatanādisvabhāvatayā bhagavatā bhāvāḥ sūtre deśitāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7426: sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva pañca skandhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7431: bhūtiryaiṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate //
SA11bsa054_u:7436: Bca_9.7 lokāvatāraṇārthaṃ ca bhāvā nāthena deśitāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7438: lokānāṃ bhāvābhiniveśināṃ skandhādideśanāvaineyānāṃ sattvānāmāpātataḥ śūnyatādeśanānadhikṛtānāṃ śūnyatāyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ sukumāropakrameṇa pravartanāya /
SA11bsa054_u:7442: nāthena narakādiduḥkhāt sattvān paritrāyamāṇena abhyudayaniḥśreyasasukhaṃ prāpayatā sattvāśayādivedinā buddhena bhagavatā deśitāḥ prakāśitāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7449: kathaṃ tarhi te kṣaṇikā ityāha- tattvataḥ kṣaṇikā naite iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7450: tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt kṣaṇikā api na bhavanti ete ime bhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7453: kathaṃ [Bcp_182] tarhi deśanāyāmapi kathitā iti manasi nidhāya [āha] saṃvṛtyā cet [iti]- yadi saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā abhidhīyanta ityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7456: saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā na paramārthataḥ iti virudhyate na saṃgacchate /
SA11bsa054_u:7458: sāṃvyavahāribhirakṣaṇikatvapratīteḥ na kṣaṇikatvaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ rūpamiti yāvat //
SA11bsa054_u:7459: etat siddhāntavādī pariharati na doṣo yogisaṃvṛtyeti-
SA11bsa054_u:7460: Bca_9.8 na doṣo yogisaṃvṛtyā lokātte tattvadarśinaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7465: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yadi nāma arvāgdarśanaiḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na pratīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7471: kutaḥ punaretat sāṃvṛtamapi kṣaṇikatvādi yogina eva paśyanti nārvāgdarśina ityāha- lokātte tattvadarśina iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7481: aśucibhāvanāsamaye aśucīti striyāḥ kāminyā nirūpaṇe vibhāvanāyāṃ lokabādhā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7492: evamukte subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat- māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7494: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
SA11bsa054_u:7508: evaṃ kathaṃ tatra satkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpasamudbhava iti parasyābhiprāyamāśaṅkayannāha māyopamādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7511: tadā māyopamānniḥsvabhāvājjinādbhagavataḥ puṇyaṃ sukṛtaṃ pūjāsatkārapādavandanādibhiḥ kathaṃ yathā kathamiveti manyase?
SA11bsa054_u:7514: na hi māyākāranirmitapuruṣasatkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpaprasūtiryukteti parasyā bhiprāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7516: tathātra parameva paripṛcchati- sadbhāve 'pi kathaṃ yatheti /
SA11bsa054_u:7519: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yathā kasyacit paramārthasato jināt paramārthasat puṇyamupajāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7525: na ca yuktisiddhaṃ paramārthasad vastusvarūpaṃ kiṃcidastīti pratipāditam //
SA11bsa054_u:7527: idaṃ tu kathaṃ samādhīyate ityāha yadi māyopama ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7528: Bca_9.9 yadi māyopamaḥ sattvaḥ kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7533: evaṃ sati mahān doṣaḥ prasajyate ityāha- yadītyādi /
SA11bsa054_u:7545: yāvatkālaṃ pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ mantrauṣadhādīnāṃ sāmagrī samudāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7564: kathamiti pṛcchati- kena prakāreṇa sattvo 'sti vidyate?
SA11bsa054_u:7572: evaṃ tarhi yathā māyāpuruṣavadhādau na prāṇātipātaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7579: samāne 'pi niḥsvabhāvatve cittasya vijñānasya māyāpuruṣasaṃtāne 'bhāvāt asattvāt na pāpakaṃ na akuśalamutpadyate prāṇātipātādi /
SA11bsa054_u:7582: tatrāpi māraṇābhiprāyeṇa prahāraṃ dadato bhavatyeva aśubham,
SA11bsa054_u:7584: māyāpuruṣādanyatra kathaṃ prāṇātipāta iti cedāha cittamāyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7599: ādiśabdādauṣadhādīnāṃ cittotpādaṃ prati asāmarthyādavyāpārāt na māyācittasaṃbhavaḥ na māyāsvabhāvaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:7600: yathā paravyāmohanibandhanānāṃ māyākāraprayuktānāṃ mantrādīnāṃ prabhāveṇa hastyādyākāranirvṛttiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7607: ata eva nānāpratyayasaṃbhavā nānāpratyayāt anekaprakārakāraṇāt saṃbhava utpādo yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
SA11bsa054_u:7611: na hi ekasmin kārye kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kāryaśabdasāmyāt sarvatra tadeva prakalpayituṃ yujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7616: naikasya kvacidupalabdhasāmarthyasya pratyayasya kāraṇasya hetoḥ sarvasāmarthyaṃ sarvasmin kārye sāmarthyaṃ śaktirasti saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:7617: kvacidṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā kutraciditi kasmiṃścit samaye deśe kāle vā dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:7621: etat sarva lokavyavahārānugataṃ kalpanānirmitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ vastutattvamupādaya samutthitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7624: etadasahamānaḥ paraḥ punaranyathā prasañjayannāha nirvṛta iti-
SA11bsa054_u:7630: tadā ayaṃ mahān virodhaḥ syādityāha buddho 'pi saṃsaredevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7631: Bca_9.13 buddho 'pi saṃsaredevaṃ tataḥ kiṃ bodhicaryayā //
SA11bsa054_u:7632: evamabhyupagamyamāne buddho 'pi sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇato nirvṛto 'pi saṃsaret janmādibhāg bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:7633: yata evam, tataḥ tasmāt kāraṇāt kiṃ bodhicaryayā?
SA11bsa054_u:7637: sā hi sarvasāṃsārikadharmanivṛttaye sarvaguṇasamuccayāśritabuddhatvaprāptaye ca samāśrīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7647: māyāpi na kevalaṃ saṃsāra iti samuccaye apiśabdaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7650: saṃvṛttyāpi kālpanikavyavahāreṇāpi na saṃbhavo na saṃsaraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:7653: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat- yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena- yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:7669: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:7672: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:7675: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamabhayamahāryamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:7677: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ yāvadavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:7681_0: eteṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ yā ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā
SA11bsa054_u:7681_1: sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā manujasaṃjñā mānavasaṃjñā
SA11bsa054_u:7732: pratyayānāṃ punarucchede sarvathaiva saṃsaraṇaṃ na syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7735: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikādicodyamudasya yogācāravipratipattinirākaraṇāya tanmatena dūṣaṇamudbhāvayannāha yadā na bhrāntirapītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7736: Bca_9.15 yadā na bhrāntirapyasti māyā kenopalabhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:7737: yadā sarvaṃ jagat māyātmakatayā svabhāvaśūnyamupagataṃ madhyamakavādibhiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7742: yasya punaḥ svacittameva paramārthasat bāhyarūpatayā bhrāntaṃ tathā pratibhāsate,
SA11bsa054_u:7745: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7746: yadā māyaiva grāhyatayā hastyādyākārapravṛtyā tava vijñānavādino nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:7752: Bca_9.16 cittasyaiva sa ākāro yadyapyanyo 'sti tattvataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7753: uktamatra cittameva bahīrūpatayā bhrāntaṃ hastyādyākāraṃ pratibhāsate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7755: kiṃ tu yadyapi cittasyaiva jñānasyaiva sa iti deśādivicchedena grāhyatayā pratibhāsamāna ākāro nirbhāsaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7760: tathāpi naitat saṃgacchata ityāha cittameva yadā māyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7761: cittameva yadā māyā tadā kiṃ kena dṛśyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7764: na hi vedakacittavyatiriktā kācidanyā māyā nāma,
SA11bsa054_u:7773: nanu syādevaitat yadi jñānasya ātmasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7774: yāvatā svasaṃvedanatayā svarūpaṃ saṃvedayat tadabhinnaṃ māyādipratibhāsamapi vedayet /
SA11bsa054_u:7775: tathā ca sati na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7777: uktaṃ ca lokanāthena cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7778: svabhāvaśūnyameva sarva jagad yadā yuktitaḥ pratipāditam,
SA11bsa054_u:7779: tadā kaḥ kasya svabhāvo vastutaḥ iti kasya kena vedanaṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:7785: kiṃ ca / uktaṃ ca kathitaṃ ca lokanāthena lokānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ nāthena śaraṇyena buddhena bhagavatā /
SA11bsa054_u:7789: Bca_9.17 na cchinatti yathātmānamasidhārā tathā manaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7790: yathā sutīkṣṇāpyasidhārā khaṅgadhārā tadanyavadātmānaṃ svakāyaṃ na cchinatti na vighāṭayati,
SA11bsa054_u:7794: tathā hi na tadevaikaṃ jñānaṃ vedyavedakavedanātmasvabhāvatrayaṃ yuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:7797: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7811: tadyathā na tasyaiva asidhārayā saiva asiṃdhārā śakyate chettum,
SA11bsa054_u:7812: na tenaiva aṅgulyagreṇa tadeva aṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7813: evameva tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ draṣṭumiti vistaraḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7814: atra cittāmātravādinaḥ svātmani kriyāvirodhaṃ vighaṭayituṃ svapakṣaprasādhanāya dṛṣṭāntamudbhāvayannāha ātmabhāvamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7816: ātmabhāvaṃ svasvarūpaṃ yathā dīpaḥ pradīpaḥ saṃprakāśayati dyotayati /
SA11bsa054_u:7817: yathā hi kila andhakārāvṛtaghaṭādivastupratipattaye pradīpa upādīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7819: api tu ghaṭādi prakāśayanneva ātmānamapi prakāśayati,
SA11bsa054_u:7821: na cāpi kvacidvirodho dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra yojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:7826: Bca_9.18 naiva prakāśyate dīpo yasmānna tamasāvṛtaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7834: na ca avidyāmānasya prakāśanaṃ yuktam, asattvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7837: syādetat- ātmabhāvamityādinā naitadabhidhīyate yadātmānaṃ ghaṭavat tamasāvṛtaṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7847: tathā tena prakāreṇa kiṃcid ghaṭādikaṃ parāpekṣaṃ pradīpādyapekṣaṃ prakāśaṃ dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7848: kiṃcit punaḥ pradīpādikamanapekṣaṃ ca svayaṃprakāśātmakaṃ dṛśyate upalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7850: evaṃ vijñānavādinā upadarśite viśeṣe siddhāntavādī nīlameva tāvannīlatve paranirapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopadarśitaṃ pratiṣedhayannāha anīlatva ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7863: nīlaṃ nīlaguṇayuktamātmānaṃ svarūpamātmanā svayameva na kuryāt,
SA11bsa054_u:7866: tasmānna nīlasyāpi parānapekṣatā nīlatvaṃ prati sphaṭikavat /
SA11bsa054_u:7867: tathā hi [Bcp_190] sphaṭikopalo 'pi vastuto 'vasthitarūpa eva upādhisaṃnidhau na nīloparāgamanubhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:7869: nīlopādhiviśeṣahakāriṇaśca pūrvasvarasanirodhāt anya eva nīlaguṇoparaktaḥ sphaṭikopala utpadyate iti siddhāntaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7872: nanu priyamidamanuṣṭhitaṃ priyeṇa yasmāt jaḍasvabhāvavyāvṛttātmatayā svahetupratyayāt utpattireva jñānasya prakāśāntaranirapekṣasya ātmaprakāśatā svasaṃvedanamucyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7888: tadā lokata eva bādhā bhavato bhaviṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:7891: tathā ca sutarāṃ na svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya,
SA11bsa054_u:7894: na cāpi jaḍasvabhāvatā madhyamakavādinaṃ prati paramārthataḥ kasyacit siddhā,
SA11bsa054_u:7899: sāṃprataṃ pradīpasya svayaṃprakāśatāmabhyupagamya buddheḥ svasaṃvedanamayuktamiti pratipādayannāha dīpa ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7900: Bca_9.22 dīpaḥ prakāśata iti jñātvā jñānena kathyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7901: buddhiḥ prakāśata iti jñātvedaṃ kena kathyate //
SA11bsa054_u:7903: tathāpi na buddhisaṃvedanasādhanaṃ prati sadṛśo dṛṣṭānta iti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7904: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti ābhāsate prakāśāntaranirapekṣaḥ svayameva,
SA11bsa054_u:7905: iti jñātvā pratītya jñānena buddhyā kathyate pratipādyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7908: tat punaḥ kena jñānena jñātvā kathyate iti paraṃ pṛcchati /
SA11bsa054_u:7909: na cātra kiṃcid buddhipratipattinibandhanamastīti asaṃbhāvanāṃ prakāśayati /
SA11bsa054_u:7919: itthaṃ sarvathā buddherapratipattau tatsaṃvedanamatīva ayuktamityāha prakāśā vetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7920: Bca_9.23 prakāśā vāprakāśā vā yadā dṛṣṭā na kenacit /
SA11bsa054_u:7926: na pratipannā kenacit pratipantrā svayaṃrūpeṇa vā /
SA11bsa054_u:7928: tadā vandhyāyā aprasavadharmiṇyāḥ striyā duhitā putrī,
SA11bsa054_u:7937: tadapratīteḥ tasyā api apratītiriti kathyamānāpi yuktirahitena vacanamātreṇa sā svasaṃvittirmudhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:7942: yadi svasaṃvedanaṃ vijñānasya nāsti na vidyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7947: tasmādanubhavaphalasya smaraṇasya uttarakālaṃ darśanāt jñānasaṃvedanamastītyanumīyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:7949: yato yadi svasaṃvedanakāryatayā smaraṇaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:7950: bhaved vahveryathā dhūmaḥ svasaṃvedanasya kāraṇaṃ smṛtiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:7959: ataḥ smaraṇamapi jñānatvāt kathaṃ siddhamiti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:7961: na ca smaraṇaṃ svasaṃvedanasya pratyakṣatayā grāhakam,
SA11bsa054_u:7965: anyatvāviśeṣāt saṃtānāntarabhāvināpi smaraṇena tasya grahaṇaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:7966: atha tena pūrvamananubhūtatvānna smaryata iti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:7972: kālpanikatve ca sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ kalpanānirmitatvāt sāṃvṛtatvamiti sādhitaṃ naḥ sādhyam /
SA11bsa054_u:7974: bhavato 'pi kathaṃ tarhi svasaṃvedanābhāve smṛtirityāha anyānubhūta ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:7976: jñānādanyasmin grāhye vastuni viṣaye 'nubhūte sati jñāne smṛtiḥ smaraṇamupajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:7977: nanu anyasminnanubhūte anyatra smaraṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ syādityāha- saṃbandhāditi /
SA11bsa054_u:7981: satyapi saṃbandhe anyasminnanubhūte anyasya smaraṇe viplutaṃ smaraṇaṃ syāditi cenna,
SA11bsa054_u:7984: jñānameva ca viṣayānubhavo nānya iti viṣayānubhavasmaraṇāttatsaṃbaddhatayā jñāne smaraṇamabhidhīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7985: na tu viṣayarahitaṃ jñānamapi kevalamanusmaryate ityadoṣaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:7987: ākhuviṣaṃ mūṣikaviṣaṃ yathā saṃbandhāt kālāntareṇa jāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:7989_0: tathā hi mūṣikaviṣamekasmin kṣaṇe śarīrasaṃkrāntaṃ punaḥ kālāntareṇa meghastanitamadhigamya
SA11bsa054_u:7994: ?] / īkṣaṇikādividyā paracittādijñānābhijñā ca tābhyāṃ yuktasya tatsāmagrīsaṃbaddhasya cittasya darśanāt pratibhāsanāt vijñānasya khaṃ prakāśate svarūpaṃ pratibhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:7996: yadi hi tat sarvadā parokṣarūpaṃ kathaṃ kadācit sāmagrīviśeṣādupalabhyeta,
SA11bsa054_u:8005: tasmād dṛṣṭaḥ pratītaḥ ghaṭo nidhānādi vā naiva añjanaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:8008: evamīkṣaṇikādividyāsahakāriṇā jñānena paracittaṃ ca ghaṭādivad dṛṣṭamiti naitāvatā tatsaṃvedanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8017: tadgahaṇābhyupagame ca uttarottarasya apratītasya pratītaye jñānāntarānusaraṇena anavasthāprasaṅgācca na kathaṃcidapi arthasya pratītiriti /
SA11bsa054_u:8021: sarvaścāyaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāro loke na syādityāha yathā dṛṣṭamityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:8029: yathā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ jñātaṃ naiveha pratiṣidhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8030: iti / yathā dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurādivijñānena pratyakṣeṇa pratipannam /
SA11bsa054_u:8038: tena jñānasaṃvedanābhāvādarthānadhigamādayo 'pi doṣāḥ paramārthapakṣavādina iha nāvataranti /
SA11bsa054_u:8040: kiṃ nāma tarhi pratiṣidhyate ityāha satyata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8053: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te /
SA11bsa054_u:8058: na tu vāstavaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣidhyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:8059: tadevaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya na kathaṃcidacidapi yujyate / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:8062: yatra boddhā ca bodhyaṃ ca tatra bodhirna vidyate //
SA11bsa054_u:8066: idānīṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ parisamāpya prakṛte yojayannāha cittādanyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8067: Bca_9.27 cittādanyā na māyā cennāpyananyeti kalpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8068: vastu cetsā kathaṃ nānyānanyā cennāsti vastutaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:8076: dvitīyapakṣe tu "yadā māyaiva te nāsti" [9.6] ityādinā pratipādita eva doṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8086: anyonyaparihāravatorekapratiṣedhasya aparavidhināntarīyakatvāt tayorekatrābhāvāt caturthī kalpanā sāpi na saṃghaṭate //
SA11bsa054_u:8089: yadi sā māyā vastusatī kathaṃ nānyā cittādvayatiriktā na bhavati?
SA11bsa054_u:8094: tasyāstatsvabhāvatvāt cittameva kevalam ityetat tadevāyātam / yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:8095: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8098: asatyapi yathā māyā dṛśyā draṣṭṛ tathā manaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8104: tena "yadā na bhrāntirapyasti" [9.15] ityādi yaduktaṃ pareṇa tat prasādhya upasaṃhāreṇa darśitam /
SA11bsa054_u:8105: punarapi prakārāntareṇa paramārthasadvijñānasādhanāya paropakramamabhisaṃdhāya āha vastvāśrayaścetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8107: tathāhi- saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca heyopādeyatayā dvayamidaṃ yathāvat pratipattavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:8112: tadevaṃ [Bcp_195] saṃkleśavyavadānayorvastusamudbhūtacittamantareṇa vyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti manyante,
SA11bsa054_u:8116: tadeva paramataṃ nirūpayati-vastveva vastusadbhūtacittameva āśrayaḥ asyeti vastvāśrayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8142: tathāpi vastusadbhūtacittasamāśritatvāt tasya arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha vastvāśrayeṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8149: tathāpi vastvāśrayeṇa vastusadbhūtacittasamāśrayeṇa abhāvasya asadātmakasya kriyāvattvam,
SA11bsa054_u:8165: astu nāma, tathāpi na bādhakānmuktirityāha grāhyamuktamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8166: grāhyamuktaṃ yadā cittaṃ tadā sarve tathāgatāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8170: grāhakābhāve ca tadupakalpitasya abhilāpyasyābhāvāt abhilāpasyābhāva ityupadarśayituṃ grāhyamuktamityuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:8172: tadā tasya cittasya sarvasattvasaṃtānāntargatatvāt sarvasaṃsāriṇaḥ sattvāḥ [Bcp_196] tathāgatā buddhā bhagavantaḥ prāpnuvanti /
SA11bsa054_u:8176: tasmāt satyapi grāhyagrāhakavaidhurye bhāvābhiniveśasya tadavasthatvānna sarvathā saṃkleśaprahāṇamityabhisaṃdhāyāha evaṃ cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8177: Bca_9.30 evaṃ ca ko guṇo labdhaścittamātre 'pi kalpite //
SA11bsa054_u:8184: nanu etatsamānaṃ niḥsvabhāvavādino bhavato 'pīti samānadūṣaṇatāmāpādayannāha māyopamatve 'pītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8186: māyopamatve māyāsvabhāvatve 'pi jagato jñāte kathaṃ kleśo nivartate,
SA11bsa054_u:8188: kimatra prahāṇānupapattikāraṇaṃ yat pṛcchasītyāha yadā māyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8190: idamatra prahāṇānupapattibījaṃ dṛśyate- yadā māyāstriyāṃ māyākāravinirmitāyāmabalāyāṃ rāgaḥ saṃraktacittatā jāyate utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8195: kiṃ tu tasyā māyāstriyāḥ kartuḥ nirmāturapi jāyate iti apiśabdārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8197: tadā na tāvat tadanye tāmabhisamīkṣya manmathaśaraprahārāntaravyathitacetaso jāyante,
SA11bsa054_u:8198: api tu yo 'pi sa tasyāḥ kamanīyakāntisaṃpadaḥ kāmakalākauśalotkaṇṭhitamūrterabhinirmātā,
SA11bsa054_u:8200: so 'pi kāmakalayā paramadaśāmāsādayan na kathaṃcidapi cetaḥ saṃdhārayitumalam,
SA11bsa054_u:8201: tat kathaṃ māyopamatve 'pi niścite saṃsārasaṃtaticchedaḥ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:8216: tasyāpi advayatattvasya sattve 'pi āgantukasaṃkleśavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvāt na sarve tathāgatā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:8220: asmākaṃ tu niḥsvabhāvameva janyaṃ janakaṃ ceti na samānam /
SA11bsa054_u:8228: durbalā śūnyavāsaneti śūnyasya śūnyatattvasya śūnyatāyā veti vigrahaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8229: chandonurodhād bhāvapratyayasya lopaṃ kṛtvā śūnyeti nirdeśaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8234: kathaṃ tarhi sā nivartate ityāha śūnyatetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8236: śūnyatāyā māyāsvabhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyā vāsanā tasya ādhānam āvedhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8244: nanu bhāvābhiniveśo vā śūnyatābhiniveśo vā iti nābhiniveśaṃ prati kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8254: ityevaṃ cābhyāsāt bhāvavāsanāprahāṇasya paścāt sāpi śūnyavāsanāpi prahīyate nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:8255: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- śūnyatāvedho hi bhāvābhiniveśasya pratipakṣatvāt prahāṇopāyabhūtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8256: adhigate ca upeye paścāt kolopamatvāt upāyasyāpi prahāṇamanuṣṭhīyate / etadevāha-
SA11bsa054_u:8261: syādetat- yadi nāma kiṃcinnāstīti manasikārābhyāsād bhavati śūnyatāvāsanāyāḥ prahāṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:8263: tataśca gaṇḍapraveśe 'kṣitārānirgamo jāta iti tadavasthaṃ tava dauṣṭhayam,
SA11bsa054_u:8265: Bca_9.34 yadā na labhyate bhāvo yo nāstīti prakalpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8270: sa yadi vicāryamāṇo niḥsvabhāvatayā na labhyate na prāpyate taimirikopalabdhakeśastabakavat /
SA11bsa054_u:8273: tasya saṃbandhino 'bhāvāt nirālambaḥ abhāvaḥ kalpanāvidarśitamūrtiḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhenmateḥ puraḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8276: athavā anyathāvatāryate- bhavatu nāma śūnyatābalādhānād bhāvavāsanāvinivṛttiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8277: tatpratiṣedhābhāvādabhāvābhiniveśastu kena vāryate ityata āha- yadā na labhyate ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:8279: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- sarvadharmaśūnyatā hi bhāvābhiniveśaprahāṇāya upādīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8283: ata eva etatsamastakalpanājālavinivartanāya bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa adhyātmaśūnyatādayo 'ṣṭādaśa śūnyatāḥ proktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8286: anyathā śūnyatāyā bhāvād vyatireke dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:8289: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairevaṃ pratyavekṣate- na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyam,
SA11bsa054_u:8305: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
SA11bsa054_u:8310: evaṃ sarvavikalpapratyastamayāt samastāvaraṇanirmuktirupajāyate ityupadarśayannāha yadā na bhāva ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:8311: Bca_9.35 yadā na bhāvo nābhāvo mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8313: yadā na bhāvaḥ paramārthasatsvabhāvo materbuddheḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puro 'grataḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8315: nāpi bhāvavirahitalakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ yadā mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8318: ābhyāmavyatiriktatayā anayoḥ saṃgrahe tāvapi saṃgṛhītāviti nirāśrayā,
SA11bsa054_u:8321: kathaṃ tarhi sakalakalpanāvirahādanekakalpāsaṃkhyeyābhilaṣitaṃ parārthasaṃpadupāyabhūtaṃ buddhatvamadhigamya parārthamabhisaṃpādayati bhagavānityatrāha cintāmaṇiriti-
SA11bsa054_u:8326: sa yathā vikalpamantareṇāpi lokānāṃ yathābhavyamicchāyāḥ paripūraṇaḥ abhilāṣasya saṃpādakaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8330: jinasya buddhasya bhagavataḥ bimbaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairvirājitaṃ śarīram /
SA11bsa054_u:8331: tathā tena prakāreṇa īkṣyate sarvakalpanābhāve 'pi parahitasukhasaṃpādanasamarthaṃ pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:8336: yatpūrvaṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāmanekaprakāraṃ bhagavatā sattvārthasaṃpādanaṃ praṇihitaṃ tasyākṣepavaśāt,
SA11bsa054_u:8338: yasyāṃ rātrau tathāgato 'bhisaṃbuddho yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:8355_0: evamasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇamākhyāya punaranyathā hetvavasthāyā eva sa tādṛśaḥ prabhāvāti-
SA11bsa054_u:8356: Bca_9.37 yathā gāruḍikaḥ stambhaṃ sādhayitvā vinaśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:8358: yathā gāruḍiko viṣatatvavit labdhamantrasāmarthyaḥ stambhaṃ kāṣṭhamayaṃ vā anyadvā sādhayitvā mantreṇābhisaṃskṛtya mamābhāvādayameva sarvaviṣāpahāracaturo bhaviṣyatīti vinaśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:8360: sa stambhaḥ tenābhimantritaḥ tasmin gāruḍike ciranaṣṭe 'pi prabhūtakālamuparate 'pi viṣādīnupaśāmayet,
SA11bsa054_u:8362: chāndasasamayaṃ paripālayatā mito 'pi upadhāyā ṇici hrasvo na kṛtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8374: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:8375: dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum //
SA11bsa054_u:8386: iti ubhayathāpi sarvathā kalpanāvirahe 'pi sattvārthasaṃpādanamavikalamupadarśitaṃ bhavati //
SA11bsa054_u:8389: kathaṃ tarhi tathāgatapūjā mahāphalā varṇyate ityāśaṅkayannāha acittake ityādi-
