SA11bsa054_u:9043: yasmāt- ahaṃ gauraḥ kṛśo dīrgho gacchāmītyādyākāraparāmarśātmaka eva ayamahaṃpratyayaḥ pratibhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:9045: na ca anyākāreṇa jñānena anyasya grahaṇaṃ yuktam,
SA11bsa054_u:9049_0: tatra naiyāyikāstāvat nityaṃ sarvagataṃ pratiprāṇibhinnamacetanaṃ cetanāyogāttu cetanaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:9049_1: sukhādiguṇādhāraṃ śubhāśubhakarmakartāraṃ tatphalopabhoktāraṃ paralokinaṃ ca ātmānamicchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:9061: tadyathā- sarpasya kuṇḍalāvasthānivṛttau ṛjutvāvasthāpravṛttau ca sarpatvasyobhayatrāpyavṛttiḥ / yathoktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9076: kāpilāstu nityaṃ vyāpakaṃ nirguṇaṃ svayameva caitanyātmakamātmānamicchanti,
SA11bsa054_u:9089: śabdādiṣu śrotrādivṛttibhirmanasādhiṣṭhitābhiḥ parigṛhīteṣu viṣayeṣu buddhiradhyavasāyaṃ karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:9094: ātmanaśca nijaṃ rūpaṃ caitanyaṃ kalpayanti te //
SA11bsa054_u:9096: pradhānenopanītaṃ ca phalaṃ bhuṅkte sa kevalam /
SA11bsa054_u:9102: upaniṣadvādinastu samastaprāṇisaṃtānāntargatamekameva vyāpi nityaṃ ca jñānamicchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:9105: na bāhyaṃ kimapyavayavi paramāṇvādikaṃ grāhyaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhamasti / āha ca-
SA11bsa054_u:9121: saṃprati citsvabhāvātmavādinaḥ sāṃkhyādayaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānāmātmaniṣedhamasahiṣṇavaḥ prāhuḥ- śabdādijñānaṃ cidātmakamātmaivāsmābhirabhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9124: śabdajñānaṃ yadi tadā śabdo gṛhyeta sarvadā /
SA11bsa054_u:9126: tasya ca nityatvāt śabdajñānaṃ nityaṃ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9127: tadā śabdo 'pi sadā nityameva tadbhāvābhāvakālayorgrahītavyaḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9132: jñeyaṃ vinā tu kiṃ vetti yena jñānaṃ nirucyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9134: śabdasya tu kādācitkatvāt na sarvadā sattābhivyaktiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9135: tataśca tadasattākāle jñeyaṃ vinā viṣayamantareṇa kiuṃ vetti kiṃ jānāti tad jñānam?
SA11bsa054_u:9137: yena jñeyena śūnyamapi jñānaṃ nirucyate abhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9141: ajānānaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9145: na hi tena kiṃcidaparāddhaṃ yena na vijñānaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9147: tasmādviṣayaparijñānābhāvāt yathā kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:9151: tena kāraṇena asaṃnihitajñeyaṃ asaṃnihitamayogyadeśasthaṃ jñeyaṃ grāhyo viṣayo yasya tattathoktaṃ jñānaṃ nāsti na vidyate iti niścayaḥ ekānta eṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9156: yato yadasya jñānasya paricchedyaṃ rūpaṃ vyaktamityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9158: śabdasya tu sadā sattvamasattvaṃ vā na vivakṣitam /
SA11bsa054_u:9162: tasya na sarvadā saṃnidhānamastīti kṛtvā iti kathaṃ noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:9168: yataḥ tadeva rūpagrāhakamiṣyate iti cedatrāha tadevetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9169: tadeva rūpaṃ jānāti tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi /
SA11bsa054_u:9170: tadeva śabdajñānameva yadi rūpaṃ jānātīti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:9177: kevalamasaṃnidhānāt na doṣa iti parasyottaramāśaṅkayāha śabdasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9179: śabdasya viṣayatāmāpannasya asaṃnidhānādayogyadeśāt grahaṇaṃ na syāt- yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:9182: tat tasmāt tarhi śabdasyāsaṃnidhānāt tat jñānamapi śabdajñānam asadavidyamānam /
SA11bsa054_u:9185: kiṃ ca / yadi śabdajñānaṃ tadā rūpagrahaṇādyātmakaṃ tanna yujyate ityāha śabdagrahaṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9189: yat jñānaṃ tad rūpagrahaṇaṃ rūpagrahaṇātmakaṃ katham?
SA11bsa054_u:9192: nanu yathā kaścideka eva kasyacidapekṣayā pitā,
SA11bsa054_u:9193: kasyacidapekṣayā ca sa eva putraḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9194: tathā prakṛte 'pi rūpadvayamekasya bhaviṣyatītyāha ekaḥ pitetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9195: Bca_9.64 ekaḥ pitā ca putraśca kalpyate na tu tattvataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9196: ekaḥ pitā eva janakaḥ putraśca janyaḥ sa eveti kalpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9200: eka eva svabhāvaḥ ubhayātmakaḥ kalpanāsamāropitavyapadeśāt [rūpabhedena] punareka eva tathā nānābhidhānena naivābhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9204: tasmāt yathā vāstavamekasya dvirūpatvaṃ tanna dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyasti,
SA11bsa054_u:9207: ito 'pi na pāramārthiko 'yaṃ vyapadeśa ityāha sattvaṃ raja iti-
SA11bsa054_u:9208: sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpi na putro na pitā yataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9209: etacca avaśyaṃ tvayāpi svīkartavyam- sāṃkhyamate hi triguṇamekaṃ jagat,
SA11bsa054_u:9210: tataḥ sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpīti samudāyaḥ samuccayārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9211: yato yasmādete guṇāḥ svasvabhāvāvasthitāḥ pratyekaṃ samuditā vā /
SA11bsa054_u:9215: te eva prāptajanakabhāvā api tena pūrvāparakālayoraviśiṣṭasvabhāvā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:9226: svabhāvastasya rūpagrāhakasya jñānasya nekṣyate na pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9233: anyena rūpeṇa svabhāvena rūpagrahaṇātmakena rūpaṃ gṛhṇātīti śeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9235: yathā nāṭyasamaye raṅgabhūmigato naṭaḥ eka eva [Bcp_218] nānārūpeṇāvatarati,
SA11bsa054_u:9237: atrāha- so 'pyaśāśvataḥ iti anityaḥ pūrvasvabhāvaparityāgena rūpāntaramāviśati /
SA11bsa054_u:9238: na ca pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāva eva naṭo nānārūpasaṃbandhāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9242: svabhāvaḥ punarasya aparāpara utpadyate nirudhyate ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9254: na hi bhāvo nāma anya eva svabhāvāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9255: yena tasyotpādanirodhayorapi bhāvasya tau na syātām /
SA11bsa054_u:9256: nāpi tadabhinnasya svabhāvasya utpādanirodhayorbhāvasya tādavasthyaṃ yuktamabhedābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9258: syādetat- bhavatveva eṣa prasaṅgaḥ yadi rūpadvayamasyātmanaḥ satyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:9259: kiṃ tarhi nijamasya rūpamapahāya aparaṃ rūpamatāttvikam,
SA11bsa054_u:9265: tarhi nijaṃ tadrūpamucyatām nijaṃ svābhāvikaṃ tasyātmano rūpaṃ tattvamucyatām /
SA11bsa054_u:9280: yadi vā avāntaraṃ bhedanibandhanaṃ viśeṣamapāsya kiṃcidākārakamāśritya ekatvamucyate tadā cetanā puruṣadharmaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9284: katham? tayoścetanācetanayoḥ yena kāraṇena astitā samā /
SA11bsa054_u:9287: nanu ca / atrāpi sādṛśyanibandhanamiṣyate eva ekatvaṃ vastubhede 'pi /
SA11bsa054_u:9289: Bca_9.68 viśeṣaśca yadā mithyā kaḥ sādṛśyāśrayastadā //
SA11bsa054_u:9291: viśeṣo bhedaḥ sarvabhāvānāmaniyamena yadā mithyā asatyam [tyaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:9296: viśeṣābhāve ca tadeva tat syānna sadṛśam /
SA11bsa054_u:9297: na hi gogavayayorgoviśeṣamananubhavan na gavayo gosadṛśo bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:9300: sa ca yadā pāramārthiko na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:9301: tadā kaḥ sādṛśyasya samānākāratāyāḥ puṃsāmanyasya vā āśrayo nibandhanaṃ vā bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:9327: tenāyamadoṣaḥ iti parābhiprāyaṃ saṃbhāvayannāha atha jña ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9330: athāyamātmā cetanāyogād buddhisamavāyāt svayamacetano 'pi jño bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9333: yadā tarhi madamūrcchāvasthāyāṃ cetanānivṛttau ayamātmā ajño na kiṃcidapi jānāti,
SA11bsa054_u:9340: acetanasya sarvakālamavikṛtasya sataḥ asyātmanaḥ caitanyena buddhisamavāyena kiṃ kṛtam,
SA11bsa054_u:9345: ajñasya kiṃcidapi hitāhitaṃ jñātumaśaktasya niṣkriyasya nirgato bahirbhūtaḥ kriyāyā iti niṣkriyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9347: athavā sarvakarmaṇi śaktivikalasya gamanādhikriyāśūnyasya vā ākāśasya prakṛtānupayogitvādākāśakalpasya /
SA11bsa054_u:9355: idānīṃ punaranyathā ātmapratiṣedhabādhakaṃ paramatenotthāpayannāha na karmetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9358: tadā tenātmanā paralokagāminā vinā antareṇa karmaphalasaṃbandho 'yuktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9371: na hi bhikṣavaḥ kṛtopacitāni karmāṇi pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau /
SA11bsa054_u:9375: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
SA11bsa054_u:9381: kathamasati ātmani karmaphalasaṃbandho ghaṭate ityāha karma kṛtvetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9382: Bca_9.71 karma kṛtvā vinaṣṭe hi phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa054_u:9383: hi yasmāt karma kṛtvā karmotpādya śubhāśubhalakṣaṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:9389: kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sugatau durgatau vā sukhaduḥkhātmakaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati utpatsyate?
SA11bsa054_u:9391: paraloke ca kṛtakarmaṇa eva phalayogino 'nyasya kasyacidutpādāt,
SA11bsa054_u:9401: ke siddhe? āhabhinnādhāre kriyāphale karma kriyā asmin bhave,
SA11bsa054_u:9404: tathāhi- na yenaiva śarīreṇa tasmin janmani karma karoti,
SA11bsa054_u:9410: syādetat- ātmavyāpāramantareṇa te eva kartṛtvopabhoktṛtve na syātāmityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:9411: Bca_9.72 nirvyāpāraśca tatrātmetyatra vādo vṛthā nanu //
SA11bsa054_u:9420: iti hetoratrātmani nirvyāpāre vādo vivādo vṛthā niṣphalaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9426: tato na vṛthā tadvāda ityāha hetumānityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9430: sa eva phālayogī phalasaṃbaddhaḥ iti evameṣa saṃbhavo na dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9432: anya eva mṛto loke jāyate anya eva hi /
SA11bsa054_u:9434: etattarhi kathaṃ nīyate yaduktam- anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma,
SA11bsa054_u:9438_1: aikyamāśritya anekeṣu ekatvaṃ lokādhyavasāyavaśādāropitameva nimittīkṛtya kartā bhoktā
SA11bsa054_u:9438_2: iti deśitam- ya eva karmaṇaḥ kartā sa eva tatphalasyopabhoktā ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9442: ata eva ca tatraivoktam- upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu vipacyante iti /
SA11bsa054_u:9445: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat /
SA11bsa054_u:9450: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti //
SA11bsa054_u:9456: yathā ca lākṣārasaparibhāvitaṃ mātuluṅgādibījamuptaṃ tatsaṃskāraparaṃparāpravṛtteḥ tatpuṣpādiṣu raktatāmutpādayati,
SA11bsa054_u:9457: na ca tatra kaścit pūrvāparakālayoreko 'nugāmī samasti /
SA11bsa054_u:9462: phalaṃ tatraiva badhnāti karpāse raktatā yathā //
SA11bsa054_u:9464: tasmādyathā bījādiṣu ātmānamantareṇāpi pratiniyamena kāryaṃ tadutpattiśca krameṇa bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:9465: tathā prakṛte 'pi paralokagāminamekaṃ vināpi kāryakāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt pratiniyatameva phalam,
SA11bsa054_u:9466: kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtasya saṃtānasya avicchedena pravartanāt paraloke phalapratilambho 'bhidhīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9469: yathā ca satyevātmani sa na ghaṭate,
SA11bsa054_u:9470: tathā sapracayamucyamānamativistaraṃ syāditi neha pratanyate // āha ca-
SA11bsa054_u:9486: kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imān skandhān vijahāti,
SA11bsa054_u:9492: etena bhagavataiva idaṃpratyayatāmātralakṣaṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi darśita eva /
SA11bsa054_u:9493: ayamapi ca saṃtānasyetyanena [saṃtāna eka ityanena] yathāvyavahāramanirūpitasvarūpaḥ sūcita eva,
SA11bsa054_u:9499: dṛṣṭā śaktirmatā sā cetsaṃvṛtyāstu yathā tathā //
SA11bsa054_u:9504: na ca atra smarturabhāve 'pi kaścid vyāghātaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9505: anubhūte hi vastuni vijñānasaṃtāne smṛtibījādhānāt kālāntareṇa saṃtatiparipākahetoḥ smaraṇaṃ nāma kāryamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9507: ativistarabhayāt pratyekamiha na pratividhīyante iti tatsamarthanamanyatraiva vistareṇāvadhāryamiti //
SA11bsa054_u:9510: paramārthe tu sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarvavikalpoparamācca na kiṃcidutpadyate vā nirudhyate vā sātmakamanātmakaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:9512: nāpi ihaloko na paraloko vā na kaścidasti,
SA11bsa054_u:9514: tasmāt sarvametat pratibimbasaṃnibhaṃ niḥsvabhāvamutpadyate nirudhyate ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9515: kāryakāraṇaṃ ca sātmakaṃ nirātmakaṃ ca nityamanityaṃ cābhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9523: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9530: na kartāsti na bhoktāsti puṇyāpuṇyaṃ pratītyajam /
SA11bsa054_u:9531: yatpratītya na tajjātaṃ proktaṃ vācaspate tvayā //
SA11bsa054_u:9537: bhagavānāha- evameva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni abhiniviśate /
SA11bsa054_u:9543: tacca karmābhisaṃskṛtamādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
SA11bsa054_u:9553_0: tat punaḥ kālāntareṇa maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:9553_1: parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāt caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9555: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmārambaṇena aupapattyaṃśikaṃ dvayapratyayaṃ prathamaṃ vijñānamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9562: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya anantaraṃ sabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate,
SA11bsa054_u:9568: iti mahārāja na kaściddharmo 'smāllokāt paralokaṃ gacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:9592: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9604: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9614: ātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhavatviti aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaśca prārthanā,
SA11bsa054_u:9616: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayatti kāyena vācā manasā,
SA11bsa054_u:9631: tatra karmaṇāṃ naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi /
SA11bsa054_u:9632: [Bcp_226] tṛṣṇāyāṃ api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
SA11bsa054_u:9633: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
SA11bsa054_u:9635: api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditam avidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati,
SA11bsa054_u:9637: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9638_0: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogādṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādanānuprabaddhaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:9638_2: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu
SA11bsa054_u:9647_1: kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu
SA11bsa054_u:9659: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9663: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:9666: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:9682: tadevamātmādivirahe 'pi karmaphalasaṃbandho 'vikalaḥ sūtreṣu bhagavatā svayamupadarśita ityupadarśitaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:9686: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:9687: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9693: cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham /
SA11bsa054_u:9696: tadapi ca ātmadṛṣṭayabhiniviṣṭānāmanyatrātmagrāhaparikalpavicchedārthaṃ neyārthatayā saṃvṛtyā cittamātmeti prakāśitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9702: yataḥ tadapi ca anyatra pudgalādyabhiniveśabādhanāya vacanam /
SA11bsa054_u:9707: tathāpi na vastutaḥ tadahaṃkāragocara ityupadarśayannāha atītetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9708: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:9709: tridhā hi cittaṃ saṃbhavati parikalpamupādāya atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9711: atītānāgataṃ naṣṭājātaṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ na ahaṃdarśanaviṣayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9716: yadatītaṃ tat kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇāmitam /
SA11bsa054_u:9719: pratyutpannaṃ tarhi cittamahaṃ bhaviṣya tītyata āha-
SA11bsa054_u:9724: asmin pratyutpanne citte naṣṭe dvitīyakṣaṇe atīte sati nāstyahaṃ punaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9728: ato na cittālambano 'pīti nirālambana evāyamahaṃpratyaya utpadyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9731: nāpi cittamahaṃkārasya viṣaya iti prasādhyopasaṃharannāha yathaivetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9732: Bca_9.75 yathaiva kadalīstambho na kaścidbhāgaśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9736: bhāgaśaḥ pratyavayavaśaḥ kṛto 'vadhūto na kaścit na vastusan prāpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9743: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet /
SA11bsa054_u:9744: yadi sarvathaiva sattvaḥ ātmā pudgalo vā vicāryamāṇo na vidyeta,
SA11bsa054_u:9746: tadā kasyopari kṛpā karuṇā bodhisattvānāṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:9752: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat- na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9753: eka eva dharmo bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ kartavyaḥ supratibiddhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9757: evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:9759: tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:9760: evameva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyāṃ bodhikārakāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavatīti //
SA11bsa054_u:9764: mañjuśrīrāha- mahākaruṇārambhā devaputra bodhisattvānāṃ caryā sattvādhiṣṭhānā //
SA11bsa054_u:9766: tasmādavaśyaṃ prathamataḥ sattvālambanā karuṇābhyupagantavyāḥ duḥkhitasattvādhiṣṭhānena samutpatteḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9767: sattvābhāve ca sā na syāditi cet,
SA11bsa054_u:9772: tadarthamabhyupetena svīkṛtena mohena saṃvṛtyā yaḥ prakalpitaḥ samāropitaḥ sattvaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9774: tathāhi sakalakalpanājālarahitaṃ sarvāvaraṇavinirmuktaṃ paramapuruṣārthatayā buddhatvamiha sādhyam /
SA11bsa054_u:9779: sā ca prathamato duḥkhitasattveṣu pravartamānā saṃbhārārambhanidānamupapadyate iti kāryārthaṃ mohasya saṃvṛtisatyarūpasyābhyupagamaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9787: ye kecidbhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti imānete (tān?)
SA11bsa054_u:9789: tato yadi nāma prajñayā nirūpayataḥ paramārthataḥ sattvānupalambhaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9790: tathāpi saṃvṛtyā na niṣidhyate iti / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:9791: yataḥ prajñā tattvaṃ bhajati karuṇā saṃvṛtimataḥ
SA11bsa054_u:9794: tadā te 'bhūdārte suta iva pituḥ prema jagati //
SA11bsa054_u:9797: sattvasaṃjñā ca te nātha sarvathā na pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9802: nanu paramārthataḥ sattvābhāve kasya tat kāryam,
SA11bsa054_u:9803: iti kathaṃ tatsādhanāya kasyacit pravṛttirityabhisaṃdhāya āha kāryamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9804: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9807: tadā ekasyānuyāyino 'bhāvāt rūpādīnāṃ ca utpannavināśitvāt kāryaṃ kasya?
SA11bsa054_u:9810: evameva etanmatameva asmākam- naiva kasyacit paramārthataḥ kāryam,
SA11bsa054_u:9812: yadyevam, kathaṃ tarhi tatsādhanāya prathamataḥ pravṛttiriti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:9815: mamaiva tat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatītyekatvādhyavasāyena sattvābhāve 'pi saṃvṛtyā māyāsvabhāvatayā /
SA11bsa054_u:9821: nanu ca moho nāma avidyāsvabhāvatayā sarvathaiva anupādeyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9822: tat kathaṃ punastasyaiva svīkāraḥ ityata āha duḥkhetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9823: Bca_9.77 duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ tu kāryamoho na vāryate //
SA11bsa054_u:9827: anyastu yaḥ paraṃparayā duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ sarvasattvajātyādivyasananimittaṃ [Bcp_230] kāryamohaḥ kāryasya paramārthasatyalakṣaṇasyādhigamāya mohaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9839: etat kāryārthamavicārataḥ [9.4] ityasmin prastāve pratipāditameva pūrvam /
SA11bsa054_u:9852: kiṃbhūtaḥ? duḥkhahetuḥ duḥkhasya sāṃsārikasya triduḥkhatālakṣaṇasya hetuḥ kāraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:9857: tathāhi ātmānaṃ paśyataḥ saṃskṛteṣu skandhadhātvāyataneṣu ahamiti dṛḍhataramutpadyate snehaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9858: tatastadduḥkhapratīkārecchayā sukhābhilāṣo doṣān pracchādya tadarthitayā guṇādhyāropāt tatsādhaneṣu pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9860: ahaṃ mameti ca darśanāt paripanthini vidveṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9861: tataḥ samastaduḥkhanidānaṃ sarva eva kleśopakleśā labdhaprasarāḥ pravartante /
SA11bsa054_u:9874: tato 'pi ātmadarśanādapi na nivartyo nivartayitumaśakyo 'haṃkāraśced yadi, tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:9882: tathāhi tadbhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamanāt sākṣānnairātmyadarśanāt virodhi satkāyadarśanaṃ nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9883: tannivṛttau ca ekasyānugāmino darśanābhāvāt pūrvāpararūpavikalasya kṣaṇamātrasya darśanam /
SA11bsa054_u:9884: tataḥ pūrvāparasamāropābhāvāt na anāgatasukhasādhanaṃ kiṃcidātmanaḥ paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:9885: tato na tasya kvacidviṣaye rāgo jāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:9891: na ca anyena kṛte 'pakāre prekṣāvataḥ anyatra vairaniryātanamucitam,
SA11bsa054_u:9893: evaṃ rāgādinivṛttau anye 'pi tatprabhavāḥ kleśopakleśā notpadyante /
SA11bsa054_u:9896: evaṃ hi pudgalaśūnyatāyāṃ satkāyadarśananivṛttau chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti /
SA11bsa054_u:9898: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlacchinnasya sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśaṃ śuṣyati,
SA11bsa054_u:9903: syādetatyadi nāma ātmā vicāreṇa kharaviṣāṇasadṛśatvānnāhaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9904: tathāpi kāyāvayavī tadviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyatrāha kāyo neti-
SA11bsa054_u:9905: Bca_9.79 kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca /
SA11bsa054_u:9906: nodaraṃ nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9907: Bca_9.80 na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9908: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9909: kāyo 'pi vicāreṇaiko naiva kaścidastītyupadarśayati- tathā hi karacaraṇādayo bhāgā evaṃ paraṃ dṛśyante,
SA11bsa054_u:9926: na kakṣau, bhujamūle api na kāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9938: atra eṣu pādādibhāgeṣu purovartiṣu śarīrakalpanānimitteṣu kataraḥ kāyo bhavatu?
SA11bsa054_u:9939: naiva kaścideko 'pi nirūpyamāṇaḥ kāyātmaka upalabhyate iti yāvat //
SA11bsa054_u:9940: athāpi syāt- naivamabhidhīyate pratyekaṃ karādayaḥ kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9941: kiṃ tarhi sarvāvayavavyāpakatvādavayavinaḥ sarvāvayaveṣu vartate ityatrāha yadītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9945: tatra yadi sarveṣu karacaraṇādiṣu avayaveṣu kāyo 'vayavī,
SA11bsa054_u:9955: tasya avakāśābhāvādeva avayaveṣu na vṛttirityāha aṃśā ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:9956: Bca_9.81 aṃśā aṃśeṣu vartante sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9957: aṃśā bhāgāḥ aṃśeṣu svasvabhāgeṣu vartante vyavatiṣṭhante,
SA11bsa054_u:9960: svayaṃ punarasau kāyo 'vayavī kva nu nāma vyavasthitaḥ iti na vidmaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:9963: Bca_9.82 sarvātmanā cetsarvatra sthitaḥ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
SA11bsa054_u:9966: avayaveṣu anavakāśatvāt sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ iti prasaṅgo nādyāpi nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:9969: ādiśabdāccaraṇādiṣu sthitaḥ samavetaḥ kāyāvayavī cet yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:9970: tadā punarayaṃ doṣaḥ syādityāha- kāyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:9979: ayaṃ ca prasaṅgaḥ anekatra ekadeśena vṛttipakṣe 'pi yojayitavyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:9984: naivāntarna bahiḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
SA11bsa054_u:9986: adhunā punaravayavinaḥ pratiṣedhāt na bahiḥ na bāhyaḥ pratyakṣādigocaraḥ kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:9989: Bca_9.83 karādibhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nāsti kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA11bsa054_u:9990: karādibhyo 'vayavebhyaḥ pṛthag bhinnaḥ upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ kāyo nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:9996: sa kāyaḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate?
SA11bsa054_u:9997: kathaṃ nviti kathaṃcidapi kāyamanupalabhamānaḥ tatsattvamasaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati- kathaṃ nu kena prakāreṇa /
SA11bsa054_u:10006: kathaṃ tarhi karādiṣu kāyabuddhirityāha- mohāttu ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:10007: mohādavidyāvaśāt tu punaḥ kāyabuddhiḥ karādiṣu ekadravyarahiteṣu,
SA11bsa054_u:10013: kathamanyatra sā na bhavati ityatrāha saṃniveśeti-
SA11bsa054_u:10021: yathā sthāṇau puruṣasvabhāvarahite 'pi puruṣasādhāraṇordhvatādisaṃniveśaviśeṣamupalabdhavato dūrādavivecitaparaviśeṣasya kasyacit vibhramāt puruṣabuddhirupajāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10027: yāvat yāvatkālāvadhiparicchinnā pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pṛthivyādiṣaḍdhātuṣaṭsparśāyatanāṣṭādaśamanopavicārātmakānāṃ karmāyattavṛttīnāṃ sāmagrī samavadhānam,
SA11bsa054_u:10029: yathā puruṣasvabhāvavirahito 'pi paramārthataḥ parikalpitarūpatayā puruṣa iva pratibhāsate vyavahriyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10032: na pūrvaṃ kalalādyavasthāyāṃ na paścādvikalitatvād bhasmādyavasthāyāṃ nijasvabhāvābhāvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10034: Bca_9.85 evaṃ karādau sā yāvattāvatkāyo 'tra dṛśyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10037: evaṃ tathā karādau yāvat sā pratyayasāmagrī,
SA11bsa054_u:10044: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥtattatpratyayasāmagrīsadbhāve tattadvastusvabhāvamantareṇāpi abhūtaṃ tattvamādarśayantī bhrāntivaśādasau kalpanā upajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10047: ato nāyaṃ kāyādivyavahāro vāstava iti vakṣyati / taduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:10051: anirdeśyaḥ svataḥ prāptaḥ kāya ityucyate katham //
SA11bsa054_u:10064: tāvat kāyo 'tra karādau dṛśyate, na paścāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10067: karacaraṇādayaḥ punaravayavāḥ pratyakśopalabdhatvāt pratiṣeddhumaśakyāḥ ityāśaṅkaya karādayo 'pi parikalpitasvabhāvā evetyupadarśayitumāha evamaṅgulītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10083: parvaṇāmaṅgulibhāgānāṃ samūhatvāt saṃghātatvāt kataro bhavediti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10084: parvaṇāmapi pratyekamavastutvamityata āha- parvāpi na vastu /
SA11bsa054_u:10089: iti / aṃśāḥ parvabhāgāḥ api aṇubhedena paramāṇuśo vibhāgena bhidyamānatvāt kalpitā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:10094: dikṣu vā vibhāgāḥ nānādigavasthitā nānārūpāṃśāḥ paramāṇoḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10098: iti nyāyāt / tathāhi- pūrvāparādidigavasthitaparamāṇvabhimukhaṃ yat tat paramāṇormadhyavartino rūpam,
SA11bsa054_u:10106: tasyāpi pūrvadigavasthitasya paramāṇoraparaparamāṇunā sarvātmanā saṃbandhena tatsvarūpāntarbhāvāt paramāṇumātraṃ dravyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10107: tathā ca sati pracayarūpā bhūdharādayo na syuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10108: ato bhavanādīnāṃ pracayamicchatā dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ samabhyupeyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10109: tadā ca ṣaḍbhiraparāpararūpeṇa yugapat saṃbandhāt ṣaḍbhāgo madhyaparamāṇuḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10117: te 'pi punaraṇīyāṃso bhāgāḥ tathaiva nirūpyamāṇāḥ nirātmatayā nabhaḥsvabhāvatāṃ pratipadyante ityāha digvibhāgo 'pītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10119: digvibhāgo 'pi digbhedena paramāṇorvibhāgo 'pi pūrvavat ṣaḍaṃśatayā bhidyamānaḥ kataro bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:10126: evaṃ karādayo 'pi vicārato niḥsvabhāvā draṣṭavyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10132: na ca kāyaḥ ahaṃkārasya viṣayo vastutaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10133: tasmādavidyāsamutthāpitātmatayā ātmādisattvamantareṇāpi pravartamāno 'yamahamiti pratyayo nirviṣaya eva samutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10139_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattva evaṃ kāyasmṛtimupasthāpayati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ pādapādāṅulijaṅghorutrikodaranābhīpṛṣṭhavaṃśahṛdayapārśvapārśukāhastakalācībāhvaṅgagrīvāhanulalāṭaśiraḥkapālamātrasamūhaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:10143: tasya pratyavekṣamāṇasya evaṃ bhavati- ākāśasamo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10146: tasya kāyaparijñānahetorna bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati,
SA11bsa054_u:10150: ayaṃ kāyo na pūrvāntādāgato nāparānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10152: āgantukairvyavahārairvyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti kuṇapa iti āyatanamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:10154: evaṃ yadā vicāryamāṇo vastutaḥ śūnyasvabhāvatayā ākāśasaṃkāśaḥ sarvathā kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10155: tadā mithyaiva vastutattvamāropya rāgādikamutpādayantaḥ saṃsāramupabṛṃhayanti bālāḥ ityāhaevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10156: evaṃ svapnopame rūpe ko rajyeta vicārakaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10157: evamityuktakrameṇa svapnopame svapnopalabdhe iva rūpe 'saumanasyasthānīye ko rajyeta,
SA11bsa054_u:10162: tadyathā- saumanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rāgo jāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10163: daurmanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā dveṣo jāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10164: upekṣāsthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā moho jāyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10173: iti hi atyantayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato 'pi nopalabhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10179: Bca_9.88 iti hi māyopamānīndriyāṇi svapnopamān viṣayān paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:10183: evametadyathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyan ko rajyeta dveṣṭi muhyati vā?
SA11bsa054_u:10185: kāyābhāve ca strāyādikalpanayāpi rāgo na yukta ityāha kāyaścetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10186: kāyaścaivaṃ yadā nāsti tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10191: tadā kāyābhāvāt kā strī kāminī yasyāḥ kamanīyatayā puruṣe rāgo bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:10192: kaśca pumān kāmukaḥ yasya rañjanīyatayā striyāṃ rāgo bhavet?
SA11bsa054_u:10193: strī hi svātmani strīti saṃkalpya bahirdhā puruṣe puruṣa iti rāgaṃ janayati /
SA11bsa054_u:10194: evaṃ puruṣo 'pi svātmani puruṣa iti saṃkalpya bahirdhā striyāṃ strīti rāgaṃ janayati /
SA11bsa054_u:10195: kāyābhāve tu striyāṃ strīti na saṃvidyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10198: na tat strī na puruṣa iti /
SA11bsa054_u:10199: tasmādasati kāye stryādikalpanākṛto 'pi na yujyate rāgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10210: ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣa iti khalu punaretad yuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:10222: cakṣuḥsparśāyatanaṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya yāvanmanaḥsparśāyatanaṃ dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāya /
SA11bsa054_u:10227: iha puruṣaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarati /
SA11bsa054_u:10234: tadyathā- keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:10238: tatra mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:10240: bhavati mahārāja samayo 'yaṃ yat strī adhyātmaṃ [ahaṃ] strīti kalpayati /
SA11bsa054_u:10241: sā adhyātmamahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati /
SA11bsa054_u:10242: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogamākāṅkṣate /
SA11bsa054_u:10258: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā kakkhaṭatvamutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatīti /
SA11bsa054_u:10261: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ saṃnirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:10273: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10275: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10276: evaṃ mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā draṣṭavyamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:10281: evaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya vedanāsmṛtyupasthānamupadarśayituṃ vedanāṃ vicārayannāha yadyastītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10282: Bca_9.89 yadyasti duḥkhaṃ tattvena prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na vādhate /
SA11bsa054_u:10283: śokādyārtāya mṛṣṭādi sukhaṃ cetkiṃ na rocate //
SA11bsa054_u:10302: na hi vastu satsvabhāvaṃ kadācidapi nivartitumutsahate /
SA11bsa054_u:10304: yaduktaṃ prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na bādhate iti,
SA11bsa054_u:10308: kiṃ tarhi samudbhūtavartinā sukhena tiraskṛtatvāt vidyamānamapi nānubhūyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10310: sadapi yadi tadduḥkhaṃ nānubhūyate na vedyate ityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10312: Bca_9.90 vedanātvaṃ kathaṃ tasya yasya nānubhavātmatā //
SA11bsa054_u:10313: vedanātvaṃ vedanāsvabhāvatvaṃ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa tasyāvyaktasya sukhasya yasya nānubhavātmatā nānubhūyamānasvabhāvatā /
SA11bsa054_u:10319: kiṃ tu sūkṣmatayā anubhūtamapi ananubhūtakalpamityatrāha astītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10320: Bca_9.91 asti sūkṣmatayā duḥkhaṃ sthaulyaṃ tasya hṛtaṃ nanu /
SA11bsa054_u:10325: prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ pravṛttena balavatā sukhena sthaulyaṃ prābalyamasya duḥkhasya hatamabhibhūtam /
SA11bsa054_u:10328: na hi sūkṣmatā nāma duḥkhasya sātānubhavakāle kācidupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10330: atha tuṣṭimātrā aparā tasmādeva udbhūtavṛtteḥ sukhāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10331: aparā tuṣṭimātrā dvitīyā sukhamātrā alpīyasī sukhakaṇikā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10334: nanu sāpyasya sūkṣmatā sāpi tuṣṭimātrā aparā,
SA11bsa054_u:10338: iti duḥkhasya sūkṣmatā avedyasvabhāvā sukhānubhavakāle nāstyeveti niścitam //
SA11bsa054_u:10340: kiṃ tarhi kāraṇavaikalyāt kadācinnopalabhyate ityatrāha viruddhetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10343: duḥkhena viruddhasya sukhasya yaḥ pratyayo hetuḥ sparśaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10349: tasyotpattau satyāṃ prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ hetuvaikalyāt duḥkhasyānudayo duḥkhasyānutpattiśceducyate, tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:10355: sa eva vedanā sukhā duḥkhā taditarā vā /
SA11bsa054_u:10366: ahirmayūrasya sukhāya jāyate viṣaṃ viṣābhyāsavato rasāyanam /
SA11bsa054_u:10367: bhavanti cānandaviśeṣahetavo mukhaṃ tudantaḥ karabhasya kaṇṭakāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10369: vedanā abhiniveśasvabhāvatvādeva ca vicāreṇa nivartayituṃ śakyate ityāha ata evetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10371: ata eveti / yata eva abhiniveśasvabhāvā vedanā,
SA11bsa054_u:10372: ata eva vicāro 'yaṃ vimarśo 'yaṃ pratipakṣo virodhī,
SA11bsa054_u:10380: tasmin saṃbhūtaṃ jātaṃ dhyānaṃ viviktaṃ kāmaiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10381: viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhamityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:10388: sāṃprataṃ hetvanabhisaṃbhavādeva na vedanā vastusatī yuktetyāha sāntarāvityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10393: sparśāḥ ṣaṭ saṃnipātajāḥ [abhi. ko.-3.30] iti vacanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10394: sa trikasaṃnipātajaḥ sparśa eva na ghaṭate,
SA11bsa054_u:10398: tadā saṃsargaḥ saṃnipāto melanaṃ kutaḥ kasmāt etayorindriyārthayoḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:10401: vyavadhāne sati sa kathaṃ bhavet iti bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10403: so 'pi na yujyate ityāha nirantaratve ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10406: evaṃ hi tayoḥ sarvātmanā nairantaryaṃ bhavet yadi aṇīyasāpi nāṃśena vyavadhānaṃ syāt sadharmatā ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10409: ekatve sati bhedābhāvāt kiṃ kena saṃgataṃ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:10414: tatra ca saṃsargadūṣaṇe na kiṃciddūṣyate ityāha nāṇorityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10426: tāvatā siddhaṃ naḥ sādhyamityāha apraveśa iti-
SA11bsa054_u:10427: Bca_9.95 apraveśe na miśratvamamiśratve na saṃgatiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10430: tathā ca tatsvarūpaṃ svātmanā vyāpnuvata eva tena saṃgatiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10432: tacca miśratvaṃ tatra praveśamantareṇa na bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10433: itthamapraveśe praveśābhāve sati na miśratvaṃ nāsaṃbhinnarūpatvam /
SA11bsa054_u:10434: amiśratve miśratvābhāve ca na saṃgatiḥ nāsaṅgaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10435: niraṃśasya sarvathaiva saṃsargo na yujyate ityāha niraṃśasya cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10444: tasya amūrtasya aṃśābhāve asattvameva prāptamiti bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10445: na caitad bhavato 'pi pramāṇapratītaṃ kvacidastītyāha saṃsarga ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10446: Bca_9.96 saṃsarge ca niraṃśatvaṃ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśaya //
SA11bsa054_u:10461: iti trayāṇāmapi saṃsargamavadhūya saṃprati samūha eva vastusan nāsti iti pratipādayannāha samūhasyāpītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10465: avastutvāt vasturahitatvāt aśvaviuṣāṇavat saṃsargo naiva yujyate iti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10473: tasmādevaṃ pratipāditakrameṇa sparśanābhāve trikasaṃparkābhāve vedanāsaṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10484: vedanāyā vicāreṇa niḥsvabhāvatvād bādhā avicārataḥ ātmādeḥ pūrvanirastatvādvedakābhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10490: saṃprati vedanābhāvāt tatpratyayā tṛṣṇāpi kāraṇavirahāt paramārthato notpādamarhatītyupadarśayitumāha yadā netyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10491: Bca_9.99 yadā na vedakaḥ kaścidvedanā ca na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10492: tadāvasthāmimāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase //
SA11bsa054_u:10497: tadā avasthāmimāṃ evaṃvidhāṃ svajanmavikalāṃ dṛṣṭvā upalabhya tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase,
SA11bsa054_u:10502: kenāyaṃ tarhi sukhasādhanatvādinā bhāveṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ pravartate ityatrāha dṛśyate ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10507: evaṃ tarhi cittameva vedakaṃ vastusadastīti cedāha svapnamāyopamātmanā /
SA11bsa054_u:10513: cittena sahotpannatvāt cittena saha janma yasya tasya darśanam,
SA11bsa054_u:10515: na tu paramārthato darśanamasti yenaivaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10521: api tu jñānaṃ viṣayākāratayā tata utpadyamānamuttarakālaṃ tasya grāhakamucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10525: anyathā pūrvaṃ prāgbhāvi paścāduttarakālaṃ jātena utpannena jñānena smaryate nānubhūyate smṛtirūpeṇa viṣayīkriyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10538: anyena tarhi sā jñānenānubhūyate vedanā? āha-
SA11bsa054_u:10540: na ca naiva / anyena tatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānenānubhūyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10543: na cāsti vedakaḥ kaścidvedanāto na tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10547: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt vedanā anubhava iti vedanālakṣaṇaśūnyatvādvedanā na tattvataḥ na paramārthataḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10559: vedako vedanā vedyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10561: yathā bodhistathā hyeṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
SA11bsa054_u:10564: iti na kasyacit sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā svakīyaṃ bhavatītyāha nirātmaka ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10565: Bca_9.102 nirātmake kalāpe 'smin ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā //
SA11bsa054_u:10566: nirātmake kasyacidātmādervedakasyābhāvādasvāmike kalāpe ekasyānuyāyino 'bhāvāt pratītyasamutpannamātre 'smin māyāsvabhāvavadupalambhagocaratāmupagate /
SA11bsa054_u:10567: evamindrajālavat paśyan saṃjātavismayo brūte- ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā /
SA11bsa054_u:10574: Bca_9.103 nendriyeṣu na rūpādau nāntarāle manaḥ sthitam /
SA11bsa054_u:10576: tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ tāvanmanovijñānaṃ nirūpayati- tathā kva punaridaṃ manovijñānaṃ svayamupasthitam?
SA11bsa054_u:10577: tatra na tāvadindriyeṣu cakṣurādiṣu manaḥ sthitaṃ sthitimupagatam /
SA11bsa054_u:10582: nāpyantarna madhye kāyasya cittaṃ nāpi bahiḥ na bāhyeṣu śarīrāvayaveṣu cittaṃ labhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10584: uktebhyaḥ sthānebhyaḥ anyatrāpi kkaciddeśāntare yatra tatra vā na labhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10587: tataḥ kathaṃ tasya niṣedha ityatrāha yanna kāye ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10588: Bca_9.104 yanna kāye na cānyatra na miśraṃ na pṛthak kvacit /
SA11bsa054_u:10597: nāpi pṛthak svātantryeṇa ca kvacidavasthitaṃ yaccittam,
SA11bsa054_u:10598: tat paramārthato na [Bcp_245] kiṃcit na vastusat /
SA11bsa054_u:10601: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt sattvāḥ prāṇinaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvena parinirvṛtāḥ parimuktasvabhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10603: svayameva tu abhūtaparikalpavaśādasatyapi satyamāropya kleśavāsanopahatacittasaṃtatayaḥ saṃsāracārakāvarodhaniṣiddhasvātantryavṛttayo 'parimuktā ityucyante na tu paramārthataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10604: iti mano vicārya cakṣurādivijñānaṃ vicārayannāha jñeyādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10605: Bca_9.105 jñeyātpūrvaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kimālambyāsya saṃbhavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10607: tathā hi na kvacit sadā sadrūpamavasthitaṃ jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:10608: kiṃ tu cakṣurādisāmagrīṃ pratītya utpadyamānaṃ rūpādijñeyagrāhakamityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10609: iti parasyāśayamāśaṅkaya vikalpayati- tat punarjñeyāt pūrvaṃ vā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:10616: pūrvaṃ jñeyamālambanamantareṇa kimālambya kimāśritya asya saṃbhava utpādaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:10617: dvitīyapakṣamāśrityāha- jñeyena grāhyaviṣayeṇa saha samānakālaṃ cedyadi jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:10622: atha jñeyādbhavet paścāt tadā jñānaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10626: paścāt tadanantaraṃ nivṛtte jñeye bhavet utpadyeta jñānam,
SA11bsa054_u:10633: sa evaṃ cittaṃ parigaveṣate- katarat taccittaṃ rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā?
SA11bsa054_u:10639: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10649: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśamabhūtakalpanatayā vividhāmupapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA11bsa054_u:10652: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:10657: yāvat cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10662: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tannaivāsti na nasti ityādi //
SA11bsa054_u:10663: evaṃ cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādayitumuktameva kramaṃ yojayannāha evaṃ cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10666: evameva yathoditanyāyena sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvabhāvānāmutpattirutpādo nāvasīyate na pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10667: teṣāmapi svahetutaḥ pūrvaṃ samānakālaṃ paścādvā utpattau idameva dūṣaṇaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vācyam /
SA11bsa054_u:10670_0: ata eva ca anutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatayā niṣprapañcatvāt sarvadharmā vimokśābhimukhā
SA11bsa054_u:10670_1: dharmadhātuniryātā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprajñaptikā avyavahārā anabhilāpyā anabhilapanīyā ityucyante /
SA11bsa054_u:10673: dharme dharmānupaśyī viharan bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:10679: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate- niṣkleśā ete dharmā naite sakleśāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10693: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
SA11bsa054_u:10699: evaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ darśayatā sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhāḥ prakāśitāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10701: tataḥ satyadvayavyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti parihartuṃ codyamutthāpayannāha yadyevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10708: tataḥ saṃvṛterabhāvāt satyadvayaṃ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ceti yaduktam-
SA11bsa054_u:10711: iti, tadetat satyadvayaṃ kutaḥ? naiva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10715: tathā marīcikādiṣu jalakalpanayeva saṃvṛtisvabhāvayā kalpanayā buddhyā vyavasthāpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10728: yo 'pi tarhi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālakṣaṇaṃ paramārthasatyamadhigamya anupalambhayogena sarvaprapañcavirahāt parinirvṛtimupayātaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10729: so 'pi sattvaḥ parinirvṛto vinirmuktaḥ kuto bhavet? naiva syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10732: buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti vacanāt nirvṛtirapi saṃvṛtiḥ syāt //
SA11bsa054_u:10735: parasya nirvṛtasattvādanyasya sattvasya cittaṃ tasyāsau vikalpaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10742: svasaṃvṛtyā nijasaṃvṛtyā svakalpanayā sa iti parinirvṛto nāsti, na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10743: parinirvṛta eva saḥ iti svayamasya sarvavikalpoparamāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10744: anyatrāpi tarhi kathamanyasaṃvṛtiḥ syādityatrāha sa paścādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10745: Bca_9.108 sa paścānniyataḥ so 'sti na cennāstyeva saṃvṛtiḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10748: iti dharmebhyo dharma utpadyamānaḥ paścādbhāvī bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10755: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadi nāma parinirvṛto buddhyā viṣayīkṛtaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10758: na raktacittenālambitaḥ svayaṃ prahīṇasarvakleśāvaraṇo vītarāgo 'pyavītarāgo bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:10759: tasmāt sarvakalpanāvirahādanyasaṃvṛtyālambito 'pi svayaṃ parinirvṛta evāsau paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10760: ata eva sarvadharmāḥ sarvakalpanāśūnyatvādanutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatvācca prakṛtiparinirvṛtā ādiśāntā ityucyante /
SA11bsa054_u:10761: tathāpi tathāvidhebhya eva tathāvidhā anye dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
SA11bsa054_u:10763: tena ca rūpeṇa parikalpavaśāt punarālambyamānāḥ sāṃvṛtāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10765: śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10773: yatha muñca pratītya balvajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
SA11bsa054_u:10774: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikaśa nāsti vartanā //
SA11bsa054_u:10778: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10779: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato eva saṃskāra anuchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:10781: araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāma trayebhi saṃgati /
SA11bsa054_u:10782: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtārthu laghu nirudhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10783: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kutayaṃ āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11bsa054_u:10784: vidiśo diśi sarvi mārgato nāgati nāsya gatiśca labhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10785: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayā /
SA11bsa054_u:10786: sāmagri tu sattvasucanā sa ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:10795: svapnavat saṃsṛtiḥ proktā tvayā tattvavidāṃ vara //
SA11bsa054_u:10797: tasmāt paramārthata utpādanirodhābhāve 'pi na saṃvṛtisatyavirodha iti sarvaṃ samañjasam //
SA11bsa054_u:10799: tadā na jñānaṃ na ca jñeyaṃ vastutaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:10800: tat kimiha kena vicāryate iti vicāro 'pi na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:10810: yathāprasiddhaṃ lokavyavahārato niścitamāśritya gṛhītvā vicāro vimarśaḥ sarva ucyate abhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:10811: sarva iti na kaścideva vicāro 'pi saṃvṛtimāśritya pratanyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10816: Bca_9.110 vicāritena tu yadā vicāreṇa vicāryate /
SA11bsa054_u:10818: vicāritena tu parīkṣitena punaryadā vicāreṇa vicāryate nirūpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:10823: vicārye tarhi vicāryamāṇe kathamiyamanavasthā na syādityatrāha vicārite ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10824: Bca_9.111 vicārite vicārye tu vicārasyāsti nāśrayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:10826: vicārye tu parīkṣye punarvastuni vicārite nirṇīte sati vicārasya nirṇayasya punaruttarakālaṃ kartavyasya āśrayo nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:10831: sarvasamāropaniṣedhaṃ vidhāya vastutattvaparijñānāt kṛtakṛtyatvāt pravṛttinivṛttyabhāvāt [Bcp_250] na kkacit sajyate,

SA11bsa054_u:10846: svasaṃvedanasyābhāvāt pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇe anavasthānaṃ syāditi kā gatirāśrayaṇīyā?

SA11bsa054_u:10959: padmasya rājīvasya nālamādi yeṣāṃ padmadalakesarādīnāṃ te tathoktāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:10962: hetubhedena hetoḥ kāraṇasya bhedena viśeṣeṇa jāyate utpadyate, nānyathā /
SA11bsa054_u:10969: nanu bhavedeṣa viśeṣaḥ yadi hetoreva svayamasau viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ syāt /

SA11bsa054_u:10975: kiṃkṛtaḥ kena kṛtaḥ kuto yātaḥ hetubhedaścet,
SA11bsa054_u:10977: pūrvahetuprabhedataḥ pūrvasya prāktanasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ prabhedataḥ prabhedādviśeṣāt /

SA11bsa054_u:10992_0: hetuvyāpāreṇa tat prasādhayataḥ svayameva punaḥ sahetukatvābhyupagamāt vandhyā me
SA11bsa054_u:10992_1: māteti bruvataḥ iva pratijñāyāḥ svavacanena bādhanaṃ syāt ityubhayataḥpāśā rajjuriti
SA11bsa054_u:10993: na heturastīti vadan sahetukaṃ nanu pratijñāṃ svayameva śātayet /

SA11bsa054_u:10997: evaṃ svabhāvavādinaṃ nirākṛtya caturthaprakāraprasādhanārthameva īśvarakāraṇatāṃ jagataḥ pratyākhyātuṃ tadupakṣepaṃ kurvannāha īśvara ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:10999: īśvarakāraṇavādino hi svabhāvavādimataniṣedhamākarṇya viśeṣamabhidhātumardhamavasitaṃ bhārasyeti manyamānāḥ prāhuḥ- sāhāyyameva anuṣṭhitamevaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11001: kevalamacetanāḥ punaramī jalapaṅkādayo vaicitryāsāmarthyā iti yuktamanenoktam /
SA11bsa054_u:11002_0: tatra astyeva sa bhagavān viśvavaicitryanirmāṇapravīṇaḥ jagadekasūtradhāraḥ sakalajagadādibhūtaḥ
SA11bsa054_u:11003: tena hetunā sahetukaṃ sakalamidaṃ sacarācaraṃ jagaditi kaḥ sacetanaḥ anyathā vaktumutsahate?
SA11bsa054_u:11004: iti naiyāyikādiveśmakathāmabhidhāya pratyācaṣṭe- īśvaro jagato hetuḥ /

SA11bsa054_u:11008: anyathā punaracetanopādānatvāt kathamamī girisaridavanisāgarādaya utpattibhājo bhaveyuḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:11020: naitaducyamānamapi svasamayābhiniveśināṃ jaḍadhiyāṃ prītikaraṃ pramāṇaśūnyaṃ viduṣāṃ saṃtoṣamutpādayati /
SA11bsa054_u:11023: tathā ca sati kāruṇikatvaṃ tasya śraddhāsamadhigamyameva syāt /

SA11bsa054_u:11029: api ca kiṃ tasminnavyāpriyamāṇe tat karmaphalamupabhujyate na vā?
SA11bsa054_u:11039: atha kṛtasya karmaṇo 'vipraṇāśādavaśyaṃ tena tatphalamanubhavitavyamiti tadupabhogāya vyāpriyate iti cet,

SA11bsa054_u:11050: namaḥ satkarmabhyo vidhirapi na yebhyaḥ prabhavati //
SA11bsa054_u:11055: tadā yadi nāma dayāvirahāt sukhaṃ nopanayati,
SA11bsa054_u:11063: rāgādimatāmapi tāvajjitendriyāṇāṃ na krīḍārthaṃ dṛśyate pravṛttiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11065: na rakṣaḥpiśācādimantareṇa anyasya paraduḥkhena krīḍā saṃbhāvyate //
SA11bsa054_u:11076: na hi svasthātmā niraparādhaṃ janaṃ pīḍayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11079: tathābhūtamapi kārayitvā punaḥ pīḍayatīti sa laukikeśvarāṇāmapi jaghanyatayā vṛttimatiśete /
SA11bsa054_u:11083: tadā asādhu tadārādhane svargāpavargārthināṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11085: tathā hi svargādilipsayā tadārādhanāya pravartante prekṣāvantaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11094: tadayamabhivicāryamāṇo na kvacidavasānaṃ labhate iti alaṃ durmativiṣyanditeṣu ādareṇeti /
SA11bsa054_u:11097: sukhasya duḥkhasya na ko 'pi dātā paro dadātīti kubuddhireṣā /

SA11bsa054_u:11103: īśvarakāraṇavādinaṃ pṛcchati- vada brūhi ko 'yamīśvaro bhavato 'bhimataḥ?

SA11bsa054_u:11172: tena īśvareṇa acintyamāhātmyena kiṃ kāryaṃ straṣṭuṃ nirmātumiṣṭamabhipretaṃ ca,

SA11bsa054_u:11200: tatrāpi na tasya vyāpāraḥ / evaṃ sati-

SA11bsa054_u:11221: tataśca hetoḥ kleśakarmādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ pūrvakoṭiḥ na cedasti,
SA11bsa054_u:11222: phalasya sattvabhājanalokavivartādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ prathamārambhaḥ kuto bhavet?

SA11bsa054_u:11243: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma asau sadā samarthasvabhāvaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11251: na hi nityatayā anādheyātiśayasya kācidapekṣā nāma /
SA11bsa054_u:11259: tathāpi te nityā vā syuranityā vā?

SA11bsa054_u:11274: itthaṃ na kācidapi tasyāpekśāstīti sadā kāryaṃ kurvīta //
SA11bsa054_u:11278: tadasya nimittakāraṇatvāt sāmagrīmapekṣya kāryaṃ kurvato noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ iti parāśayamāśaṅkayāha apekṣata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11280: yadi nāma asau sadā sarvakāryāṇi kartuṃ samarthaḥ,

SA11bsa054_u:11294: svarūpaṃ cāsya prāgapi samarthaṃ tadeveti kathaṃ kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ?

SA11bsa054_u:11341: etena yaduktaṃ kenacit- buddhimattvādīśvarasya naiṣa doṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11346: tathā hi tā api icchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa eva tasyopālambhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11349: kiṃ tāsāṃ viyoge 'pi na karoti atha asahakārivaikalye 'pi kāryākaraṇe sarvadā tadāyattaḥ?

SA11bsa054_u:11362: tathā ca sati anyasādhāraṇasvabhāvasya kathamīśatvamiti neśvarakāryaṃ jagadvaicitryamiti siddham //

SA11bsa054_u:11375: sattvaṃ rajastamaśceti ete trayo guṇā aviṣamaṃ sthitāḥ sāmyāvasthāṃ prāptāḥ pradhānamiti kathyante,
SA11bsa054_u:11394: ṣoḍaśaka iti ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca ca tanmātrāṇi /

SA11bsa054_u:11419: ekasya sataḥ pradhānasya trisvabhāvatvaṃ sattvarajastamobhedena tryātmakatvamayuktamasaṃgatam /
SA11bsa054_u:11426: Bca_9.129 evaṃ guṇā na vidyante pratyekaṃ te 'pi hi tridhā //

SA11bsa054_u:11433: yadā caivaṃ vicārayato guṇā na santi,
SA11bsa054_u:11434: tadā tadvivartarūpāḥ śabdādayo 'pi na yujyante ityāha guṇābhāve ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11448: yaśca sattvādīnāṃ sukhādirūpatāmupapādayituṃ tatpariṇāmasya rūpādino vyaktasya sukhādyanvayo heturuktaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11453: vastrādau acitsvabhāve paṭādau sukhāderapi cidātmakasya tādātmyenāsaṃbhavaḥ abhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11455: te ca guṇā na hi santi /
SA11bsa054_u:11457: athāpi syāt- na sukhādyātmakatayā parādayaḥ sukhādisvabhāvā ucyante,
SA11bsa054_u:11460: tasya sukhāderheturūpāḥ kāraṇasvabhāvā bhāvā bāhyāḥ paṭādayaścenmatam,
SA11bsa054_u:11466: tat ke ime bhāvāḥ sukhādiheturūpā bhaviṣyanti? api ca /
SA11bsa054_u:11467: vyaktasya sukhādisvabhāvatve paṭādaya eva sukhādijanyāḥ syurityāha sukhādyevetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11483: paṭādikāryatvāt sukhādyapi na syāditi tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt sukhādestatkāryatvam /
SA11bsa054_u:11494: satyāmeva sukhavyaktau saṃvittiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11499: ekadā bhūtāyāṃ sukhavyaktau sukhasya nityatve sati /
SA11bsa054_u:11501: sukhasya saṃvedanaṃ sarvadā kiṃ na syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:11503: tasmāt kadācidanupalabhyamānaṃ tat tadā nāstīti niścitamiti kathaṃ nityatvam?
SA11bsa054_u:11507: Bca_9.133 tadeva sūkṣmatāṃ yāti sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca tatkatham //
SA11bsa054_u:11512: kutaḥ? yad yasmāt sthūlaṃ vyaktasvabhāvaṃ sat,
SA11bsa054_u:11515: nitya tayā nānāsvabhāvatā ekasya na yukteti bhāvaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11516: athāpi syāt- ekadā parasparaviruddhayorekasminnayogaḥ pūrvadharmanivṛttau tu dharmāntarotpatterna doṣa ityāha sthaulyamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11518: sthaulyamāvirbhāvarūpatāṃ tyaktvā parityajya bhavet sūkṣmaṃ tirohitarūpaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11519: evamabhyupagame sati anitye sthaulyasūkṣmate utpādavināśālīḍhatvādadhruve sthaulyasūkṣmate syātām /
SA11bsa054_u:11527: anyathā kathaṃcit kenacidrūpeṇa avasthānāt pūrvavat punarupalabdheḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11534: tathā hi tat sthaulyaṃ sukhādbhinnamabhinnaṃ vā syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11536: tadā tasmin nivṛtte 'pi pūrvavat sukhasaṃvedanaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11539: na ca satyapi saṃbandhe akāraṇasya nivṛttau anyasya nivṛttiryujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:11548: yadi sthaulyaṃ sukhādanyat bhinnaṃ na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:11551: tatsvabhāvatayā sthaulyasya nivṛttau sukhasya vinivṛtteḥ sukhasya anityatā vinaśvaratā sphuṭaṃ niścitam //
SA11bsa054_u:11569: anabhilāṣiṇo 'pi te tava sadutpattivādinaḥ sthitā āpannā /
SA11bsa054_u:11570: anyathā prāgapi tasya sadbhāve paścādvat pūrvamapi tadupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11574: api ca / satkāryavādinaḥ kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ kāryasadbhāvāt idamapi dūṣaṇamaparamāśaṅkayate ityāha annāda ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11576: annamattītyannādaḥ annabhakṣakaḥ amedhyabhakṣaḥ syāt aśucibhoktā bhavet / katham?
SA11bsa054_u:11582: kiṃ ca idamapi satkāryavādinaḥ prasaṅgāntaramāsañjayannāha paṭārgheṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11585: karpāsabīje kāraṇe bhaviṣyataḥ paṭasya kāryasya sadbhāvāt paṭasyārgheṇa mūlyena karpāsabījaṃ krītvā gṛhītvā nivasyatāṃ paridhīyatām //
SA11bsa054_u:11586: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma paramārthataḥ kāraṇe kāryamasti,
SA11bsa054_u:11587: tathāpi nāyaṃ saṃvṛtyavidyātimiropahatalocanaḥ sāṃvyavahāriko lokaḥ paśyatītyāśaṅkayannāha mohādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11590: mohādajñānāt sadapi vastutattvaṃ nekṣate na paśyati lokaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11594: yadi nāma na loko 'paśyaṃstathā vyavahāraṃ karoti,
SA11bsa054_u:11597: yataḥ tattvajñasyāpi kāraṇe kāryamastīti paramārthavedino 'pi sāṃkhyasya sā sthitiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11599: te 'pi dṛśyante annabhakṣaṇādiṣu pravartamānāḥ karpāsabījaṃ paṭārthinaḥ pariharantaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11605: tathāhi- kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāraṇe astīti niścayaḥ ubhayorapi tattvajñasya lokasya ca sādhāraṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11618: evaṃ ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ kāpilaḥ siddhāntavādino 'pi sādhāraṇadūṣaṇamāsañjayannāha pramāṇamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11620: yadi pramāṇamapi paramārthataḥ pramāṇaṃ na bhavatīti bhavatāṃ pakṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:11622: pramāṇasyāprāmāṇye tatpramitaṃ tena pramāṇena paricchinnaṃ mṛṣā alīkaṃ prāpnoti /
SA11bsa054_u:11626: tadā yeyaṃ bhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyatā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tasmāt pramāṇānniścitā,
SA11bsa054_u:11629: sarvapramāṇopadarśitasya mṛṣārthatvāt sāpi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tadvicārakapramāṇopadarśitaiva iti samāno nyāyaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11633: kalpanākalpitaṃ samāropitaṃ bhāvamaspṛṣṭvā kalpanābuddhayā agṛhītvā tadabhāvo na gṛhyate nālambyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11634: tathāhi ghaṭamāropitarūpeṇa parikalpya tatsaṃbandhitayā ghaṭābhāvaṃ pratipadyate lokaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11635: ghaṭasya vicāreṇa lokaprasiddhenaiva yadā na kiṃcit svarūpamavatiṣṭhate,
SA11bsa054_u:11636: tadā tadabhāvaḥ tadviparyayarūpaḥ sutarāṃ na kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:11638: Bca_9.140 tasmādbhāvo mṛṣā yo hi tasyābhāvaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛṣā //
SA11bsa054_u:11642: tasya niḥsvabhāvasya bhāvasya abhāvo virahaḥ sphuṭaṃ niścitaṃ mṛṣā asatyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11644: evaṃ ca bhāvābhāvayoḥ parikalpitarūpatve sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvataiva avatiṣṭhate //
SA11bsa054_u:11645: punaridameva upasaṃhāravyājena vispaṣṭayannāha tasmāt svapne ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11646: tasmātsvapne sute naṣṭe sa nāstīti vikalpanā /
SA11bsa054_u:11648: tasmāt svapne middhākrāntacittāvasthāyāmutpannavinaṣṭe sute putre sati sa putro nāstīti vikalpanā tadabhāvavikalpaḥ / kiṃ karoti?
SA11bsa054_u:11650: Bca_9.141 tasya sutasya bhāvaḥ tasyāstitvaṃ tasya kalpanā sattvasamāropaḥ tasyotpādaḥ unmajjanaṃ taṃ ni[vi?]badhnāti /
SA11bsa054_u:11651: niṣedhayati- tathaiva tarhi seti cenna mṛṣā ca sā //
SA11bsa054_u:11652: sā kalpanā tadbhāvakalpanāṃ vibadhnāti api mṛṣā /
SA11bsa054_u:11654: athavā satyābhimate eva sute svapne naṣṭe sarvametadyojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:11656: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yathā svapnopalabdhasya vastuno 'nutpannāniruddhasyāpi kalpanopadarśitau bhāvābhāvau na paramārthasantau,
SA11bsa054_u:11658: na ca sā kalpanā asatyārthaviṣayatayā apramāṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:11661: iti tasyā aprāmāṇye 'pi na sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā vighaṭate /
SA11bsa054_u:11668: evamahetubhūtasvabhāveśvarapradhānakartṛtvaṃ jagato nirākṛtya nāpyahetutaḥ ityasyārthaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha tasmādevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11673: svabhāvāderahetuto 'kāraṇājjātaṃ kiṃcit kāryaṃ nāsti na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11678: nanu yadi nāma svabhāveśvarapradhānāderahetuto na kiṃcidasti,
SA11bsa054_u:11680: tat kathaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā setsyatīti parāśayamāśaṅkaya na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām iti koṭitrayaṃ samarthayannāha na ca vyastetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11681: Bca_9.142 na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣu vyavasthitam //
SA11bsa054_u:11682: na ca naiva / vyastasamasteṣviti vyasteṣu samastesu ca /
SA11bsa054_u:11688: tatra na tāvat svataḥ svabhāvādbhāvā utpadyante /
SA11bsa054_u:11689: utpādāt pūrvaṃ tasya svabhāvasyāvidyamānatvāt kuta utpadyantām?
SA11bsa054_u:11690: utpanne ca tasmin satyapi svarūpe tasyāpi niṣpannatvāt kimutpadyantām? api ca /
SA11bsa054_u:11691: svata eva janmani jātasyaiva punarjanma syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:11694: jātasya punarjanmani bījadīnāmeva āsaṃsāraṃ pravṛtteḥ nāṅkurādayaḥ kadācidutpattumavasaraṃ labheran /
SA11bsa054_u:11695: na ca etadabhyupagacchato 'pi lokata eva bādhāmanubhavat siddhipathamupayāti,
SA11bsa054_u:11701: tathā hi yāvat svabhāvo na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:11707: parato hi janmani iṣyamāṇe śālibījādapi kodravāṅkurasyotpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11712: tathāpi kāryakāraṇayoranyonyajanyajanakabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt na sarvasyotpattiriti cet, na /
SA11bsa054_u:11713: anutpanne hi kārye kasmin punarasya śaktiriti vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:11720: iti na kiṃcit kenacidekasaṃtatipatitaṃ sadṛśaṃ vā janyajanakabhāvaniyataṃ vā asti,
SA11bsa054_u:11728: na hi ekenāndhenādṛṣṭamārgo bahubhirapi draṣṭuṃ śakyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11729: pratyekaṃ vā sikatāstailadānāsamarthā militā api tatsamarthā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:11731: iti svaparobhayajanitamahetujanitaṃ vā tattvato na kiṃcidasti /
SA11bsa054_u:11732: tasmāt paramārthato 'nutpannāniruddhasvabhāvaṃ māyāmarīcipratibimbapratiśrutkāsamaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ svabhāvaśūnyameva sarvaṃ viśvamābhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:11736_0: ihoktaṃ bhagavatā- ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajīvamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ
SA11bsa054_u:11738: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvam- ityādi pūrvavat yāvat- avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati so 'nuttaradharmaśarīraṃ buddhaṃ paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:11743: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11762: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
SA11bsa054_u:11763: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti,
SA11bsa054_u:11766: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11771: yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtusamavāyāt bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11781: tadā sarveṣāṃ [Bcp_270] samavāyāt bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:11782: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA11bsa054_u:11783: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA11bsa054_u:11784: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
SA11bsa054_u:11785: atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:11786: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11791: na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
SA11bsa054_u:11794: na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11816: evaṃ bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ // iti /
SA11bsa054_u:11824: pratītyasamutpādo 'pi yathāvadevaṃ saṃgacchate iti traikālyavādimatamāśaṅkayāha anyata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11825: anyato nāpi cāyātaṃ na tiṣṭhati na gacchati /
SA11bsa054_u:11835: sa ca dharmo na ca nityaḥ iti kathametat setsyati?
SA11bsa054_u:11836: atha pūrvāparakālayoḥ kāritraśūnyatayā dharmasya adhvasu viśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11837: tathā hi yadā asaṃprāptakāritraḥ kṛtyaṃ na karoti,
SA11bsa054_u:11840: yadā tu kṛtyānnivṛttaḥ tadā atīta iti viśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:11842: tenaivātmanā tasyaiva [Bcp_271] tadāpi sadbhāvāt kāritramapi kathaṃ na syāditi vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:11845: kāritraṃ vā kathamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca ucyate?
SA11bsa054_u:11848: pāścātye ca dharmasyāpi svayamatītatvādivyavasthāyāṃ na kiṃcit kṣīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11860: svabhāvaḥ sarvadā nāsti bhāvo nityaśca neṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:11883: pratibhāsamānasya ca pratyutpannasya na rūpaṃ kiṃcidvicāreṇāvatiṣṭhate, tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:11884: Bca_9.143 māyātaḥ ko viśeṣo 'sya yanmūḍhaiḥ satyataḥ kṛtam //
SA11bsa054_u:11885: māyātaḥ aindrajālikanirmitahastyādirūpāyā api niḥsvabhāvatayā viśeṣo naiva kaścit asya hetupratyayopajanitasya vasturūpasya paridṛśyamānasya //
SA11bsa054_u:11888: Bca_9.144 māyayā nirmitaṃ yacca hetubhiryacca nirmitam /
SA11bsa054_u:11889: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām //
SA11bsa054_u:11893: yacca vasturūpaṃ māyāhetunā māyāsvabhāvena yadviracitamiti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:11897: tanmāyānimirtaṃ hetunirmitaṃ vā vasturūpaṃ [Bcp_272] kutaḥ kasmāt?
SA11bsa054_u:11901: yadi tasya kutaścidāgacchati kvacid gacchati vā upalabhyate //
SA11bsa054_u:11914: evaṃbhūte vasturūpe kṛtrime parāyattavṛttitayā asvābhāvike satyatā amṛṣārthatā kutaḥ?
SA11bsa054_u:11917: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye /
SA11bsa054_u:11918: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:11921: na ca hetupratyayānāṃ sāmarthyaṃ kvacidapi paramārthataḥ saṃbhavati //
SA11bsa054_u:11925: tatra na vidyamānaḥ kriyate ityāha vidyamānasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11927: vidyamānasya kāraṇavyāpārāt prāgeva satsvabhāvasya hetunā kāraṇena kiṃ prayojanam?
SA11bsa054_u:11936: syādetat- yadi nāma vidyamānasya niṣpannatvāt kartavyābhāvāt na hetunā kimapi prayojanam,
SA11bsa054_u:11937: avidyamānasya tu kiṃ na bhavatītyāha nābhāvasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:11954: ko vā tarhi abhāvādanyaḥ aparaḥ bhāvatām,
SA11bsa054_u:11959: kiṃ tarhi prāgabhāvasya bhāvavirodhinaḥ sadbhāvāttadā bhāvo na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:11968: tenaivotpadyamānena bhāvena abhāvasya vināśo bhaviṣyatīti cedāha-
SA11bsa054_u:11973: tasmāt na ajātena anutpannena bhāvena so 'bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvarūpaḥ apagamiṣyati nivartayiṣyate //
SA11bsa054_u:11974: athāpi syāt- mā apagacchatu nāma abhāvaḥ,

SA11bsa054_u:11982: na caiva anapagate anivṛtte abhāve bhāvasyāvasaraḥ avakāśaḥ,

SA11bsa054_u:11994: ubhayānubhayapakṣe ca pratyekapakṣaniṣedhādeva kāraṇavyāpārasya niṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavatīti draṣṭavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:11998: na sannutpadyate bhāvo nāpyasan sadasanna ca /

SA11bsa054_u:12025: "utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasamatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmadhātuḥ tathatā avitathatā" /
